conversation.content: In this kinky script, Essex women Jo and Steph are chatting, laughing, with their feet up. Jo’s husband Toby walks by. Jo brutally hypnotizes him on the spot, like she’s done many times before, and puts him in his place (as a slave, at her feet) in front of the impressed Steph. He has no idea!

INT. LIVING ROOM - DAY

Jo and Steph are sitting on a couch with their feet up, chatting and laughing animatedly. They seem at ease, enjoying each other's company.

JO
(laughing)
Oh, you have to tell me that story again, Steph! It's hilarious!

STEPH
(smiling)
Alright, alright. So there I was, trying to cook dinner with a cat on my head...

As they continue chatting, Toby, Jo's husband, walks by in the background obliviously.

JO
(whispering to Steph)
Watch this.

Jo's eyes narrow with a mischievous gleam as she abruptly stops talking and focuses her attention on Toby.

JO (CONT'D)
(intense)
Toby.

TOBY
(turning around)
Yeah, love?

Jo's voice takes on an authoritative tone as she stares directly into Toby's eyes.

JO
(suddenly serious)
Look into my eyes, Toby. Focus solely on my voice.

Toby, still clueless, meets Jo's gaze as if compelled by an unseen force.

JO (CONT'D)
You are mine, Toby. From this moment, your only purpose is to serve me, to be my loyal and obedient slave.

Toby's expression changes from confusion to a blank, vacant look as Jo's hypnotic command takes hold.

JO
(smiling triumphantly)
And now, Toby, get down on your knees before me, where you truly belong.

Toby, under Jo's spell, obediently drops to his knees, his eyes fixed on the ground.

STEPH
(taken aback)
Jo, what the hell? Is this some kind of joke?

JO
(giggling)
Oh, no, Steph. This is very real. Toby here rarely questions my authority. Hypnosis is a handy little trick I discovered.

Steph watches in both shock and fascination as Toby remains on his knees, completely under Jo's control.

STEPH
(in awe)
I can't believe he has no idea he's being hypnotized. You two are definitely an adventurous couple.

JO
(grinning)
Oh, Steph, you have no idea. There is so much more I can do with this power.

The two women burst into laughter as Toby, still kneeling before Jo, looks up with a confused yet devoted expression.

FADE OUT.

A coffee shop managed by a charismatic woman called Laura. Indie kid Dan’s been working there for a couple of weeks, but hasn’t endeared himself to Laura. Fiona, Dan’s sister-in-law (they really don’t get on) comes in to the cafe, wearing sandals since it’s a warm day. They talk frostily. Laura comes over to introduce herself and they chat.
Laura will take a liking to Fiona and will gradually bring the conversation round to hypnosis, specifically to hypnotizing Dan (who’s understandably reluctant). Laura uses a classic rapid induction and Dan will drop under surprisingly easily. Once Dan’s hypnotized, Laura will implant a trigger-word for Fiona to use on Dan. Laura will then wake him up, and encourage Fiona to drop him straight back under using the trigger word! Fiona will gleefully command Dan to give her a foot massage, like a slave. In a deep mindless trance, Dan’s only desire is to obey, helplessly kneading Fiona’s feet, taking direction.

In a cozy corner of the coffee shop, the aroma of freshly roasted beans filling the air, Laura, the charismatic manager, observed the interactions between Dan and Fiona from behind the counter. She couldn't help but notice the frosty atmosphere between them.

Fiona, wearing a pair of casual sandals on the warm summer's day, entered the coffee shop and made her way towards Dan. Tension hung in the air as they exchanged curt greetings.

Curiosity piqued, Laura decided to intervene, hoping to ease the tension and find common ground. With a warm smile, she approached the pair and introduced herself. "Hi there! I'm Laura, the manager of this lovely coffee shop. It's a pleasure to meet you, Fiona."

Fiona's initial cold demeanor softened slightly as she shook Laura's hand. "Nice to meet you, Laura," she replied, her voice tinged with skepticism.

As they chatted, Laura skillfully guided the conversation towards the topic of hypnosis. She shared stories of the power of the mind and the intriguing possibilities that hypnosis presented. Fiona, intrigued by the subject, started to open up, her curiosity overcoming her initial reservations.

Meanwhile, Dan, who had been listening but keeping his distance, couldn't help but feel a mixture of apprehension and intrigue. Deep down, he knew his skepticism about hypnosis stemmed from his fear of losing control.

Sensing Dan's reluctance, Laura reassured him. "Don't worry, Dan. Hypnosis is completely safe and voluntary. It's all about relaxation and suggestion, nothing more. But if you're not comfortable, we can explore other topics."

Dan hesitated for a moment before deciding to give it a try, albeit reluctantly. He figured it couldn't hurt to see what all the hype was about.

Laura guided Dan through a classic rapid induction, seamlessly guiding him into a state of deep relaxation. To his surprise, Dan found himself sinking into a hypnotic trance more easily than he had expected.

With Dan under her influence, Laura implanted a simple trigger word for Fiona to use. Once the suggestion was in place, Laura gently brought Dan back to full wakefulness.

Curiosity sparking in her eyes, Fiona couldn't resist trying out the trigger word. "Pineapple," she said hesitantly, unaware of the power it held over Dan.

In an instant, Dan's eyes glazed over, his conscious mind slipping away as he fell back into the hypnotic trance. Fiona couldn't believe her eyes as she now held power over her difficult brother-in-law.

With mischievous delight, Fiona commanded Dan to give her a foot massage, his hypnotized mind obediently carrying out her wishes. Totally mindless and controlled, Dan knelt before her, gently kneading her feet, completely helpless to defy her commands.

Laura watched the scene unfold, both amused and impressed by Fiona's newfound control. Allowing herself a small smile, Laura knew that this unlikely encounter had resulted in an unexpected turn of events, forever altering the dynamics between Dan and Fiona.

Little did they know that this peculiar hypnosis session would be the beginning of a deeper understanding and connection between them all, bringing about unforeseen changes in their relationships and outlook on life. And as the coffee shop hummed with the sounds of life and companionship, Laura continued to be the charismatic force that brought people together, one cup of coffee at a time.

conversation.content: (David’s flatmate Greg sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Greg has made an arrangement with a friend of his, Emma, to send David over to do Emma’s housework for her, and anything else she might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Greg wants. In a daze, he knocks, and Emma opens the door, smirking, wearing a sweater, jeans and bare feet.

"Hello David," she says, stepping aside to let him enter. "Greg told me you're here to do some housework for me today."

David nods, still in a hypnotic trance. "Yes, whatever you need me to do."

Emma leads him into the living room, cluttered with magazines, books, and empty snack bags. "I haven't had time to clean up lately," she says. "Could you start by picking up all these things and putting them away?"

David nods again and begins to collect the scattered items. As he works, Emma stretches out on the couch, watching him with amusement. "You're quite the obedient servant, David," she says. "I might have to borrow you from Greg more often."

David continues to work without responding, lost in his trance. Emma picks up a magazine and begins to read, occasionally glancing over at David and smiling to herself.

After an hour of cleaning and organizing, Emma declares that she's satisfied with the state of her living room. "Thank you, David," she says. "You've been very helpful."

David nods once more, still in a dreamlike state. "Is there anything else you need me to do?"

Emma considers for a moment, then grins. "Actually, there is one more thing. Do you like feet, David?"

David's expression is blank as he responds, "Yes, I like feet."

"Good," Emma says, wiggling her toes. "Come over here and give them a nice massage."

conversation.content:
(Unknown to him, Dan’s boss Justine is able to hypnotize him with ease using her voice) One warm, humid afternoon in July, when all the women were wearing sandals in the office, his manager Justine called Dan into her office for a chat. When he entered, not only Justine, but also Jacqui, with whom he did not get on well at all, was in there. (they have ulterior motives)
Justine took off her glasses. “I suppose you’re wondering what this is about.”

Dan nodded, feeling a bit nervous. He noticed both Justine and Jacqui wearing sandals, their perfectly manicured feet on display. He couldn't shake the feeling that something odd was happening.

"Yes, I admit I'm curious," Dan replied, managing a smile.

Justine leaned back in her chair, her fingers tapping rhythmically on the desk. As she spoke, Dan couldn't help but notice something alluring and hypnotic about her voice.

"Well, Dan, it's about your performance here at the office. You see, we think you have potential, but we need to make a few...adjustments in your attitude and behavior."

Jacqui smirked, crossing her legs and swinging her foot gently, drawing Dan's attention to her sandaled feet. He couldn't explain why, but he felt compelled to listen to Justine's words even more closely.

"We believe that with a little...guidance and motivation, you can become an ideal employee. For example, we would like your relationships with your coworkers to be more amiable, wouldn't you agree, Jacqui?"

Jacqui nodded, her eyes meeting Dan's for a moment with an unnerving intensity. "Absolutely. We all need to work together and support each other."

Dan shifted in his seat, feeling a strange sense of compliance wash over him. He didn't understand why he suddenly felt so eager to agree with Justine and Jacqui.

"Yes, I agree. I'll do my best to improve my relationships with everyone here," Dan said, nodding his head slowly, feeling a bit drowsy.

Justine smiled, her voice gentle but firm. "Good. Now, I want you to listen carefully to my words, Dan. From now on, you will become a model employee, dedicated to your work and cooperating with your coworkers. In addition, you will treat Jacqui with respect and be eager to cooperate with her on any projects. Do you understand?"

Dan felt his mind foggy, but he couldn't help but agree. "Yes, I understand."

With that, Justine glanced at Jacqui, and the two women shared a knowing smile.

"Excellent, Dan. You're going to do great things here. Now, you may go back to work, but remember what we've discussed today."

As Dan left the office, feeling strangely refreshed and motivated, he didn't realize just how easily he had been hypnotized and manipulated. His relationship with his coworkers, especially Jacqui, would never be the same. And Justine knew she now had Dan under her control, ready to mold him into the perfect employee for their plans.
That afternoon, Jacqui smugly tests her power over Dan.

As they worked on a project in the conference room together, Jacqui watched Dan closely, eager to see the effects of Justine's hypnotic influence. She subtly started to exert her authority, slowly testing her newfound power over him.

"Dan, could you please fetch me the relevant financial reports from last quarter?" Jacqui asked, with an air of superiority in her voice.

Without hesitation, Dan nodded and quickly left the room to retrieve the documents for her. Jacqui reveled in her newly gained control, smirking to herself as she noticed how obedient Dan had become. He returned shortly after, handling her the requested files with a friendly smile.

"Thank you, Dan," Jacqui said, exaggerating her satisfaction.

As the day went on, Jacqui continued to issue requests to Dan – some reasonable, others slightly unreasonable – but Dan never hesitated to comply. He even offered to stay late to help her finish the project, something he would never have done in the past.

By the time they were about to leave the office, Jacqui couldn't resist one final test. "Dan, I have one last favor to ask," she said in a sweet voice. "Could you perhaps massage my feet? They're really sore after standing for so long today."

Dan hesitated for a moment, feeling a pang of resistance deep down. However, Jacqui's powerful gaze, combined with the lingering influence of Justine's voice in his mind, made it impossible for him to refuse. He reluctantly agreed, gently massaging Jacqui's feet as she smugly relaxed in her chair.

As the day finally came to an end, Jacqui knew that Dan's transformation was complete. She couldn't wait to report their success back to Justine, and to dream up new tasks for Dan in the future. No longer having to worry about conflicts with him, she was ready to fully enjoy her newfound power in the office.
describe this foot massage scene from Dan's pov, with details of Jacqui's expression and descriptions of her feet

As Dan knelt down in front of Jacqui, he couldn't shake the uneasy feeling residing deep within him. He knew that he was under the influence of Justine's powerful words, yet he felt compelled to continue with his task. He stared at Jacqui's feet, encased in the stylish sandals she'd worn all day. Her slender toes were perfectly manicured, painted a soft pink color that seemed to contrast with her domineering demeanor.

Taking a deep breath, he slowly removed her sandals, revealing the delicate arches of her feet. The warmth from wearing the sandals all day radiated against his hands, and he could smell a faint whiff of the fragrance Jacqui had used on her feet that morning, a mix of floral and fruity notes.

He glanced up at Jacqui's face, seeing a mix of smug satisfaction and anticipation in her expression. Her eyes were locked onto him, and there was a slight upturn at the corners of her mouth, as though she was amused by the situation. Dan felt a mixture of embarrassment and curiosity; while part of him wanted to rebel against this forced act of submission, another part was intrigued by the newfound dynamic that had been thrust upon them.

Doing his best to push aside his reservations, Dan began to gently massage Jacqui's feet, starting with her delicate toes. He carefully pressed and rubbed each one, receiving a nod of approval from Jacqui as her eyes remained locked on him. Next, he gently massaged the balls of her feet, then worked his way to her arches and heels, applying firm but careful pressure.

Jacqui's expression shifted slightly, a look of genuine contentment replacing her earlier smug demeanor. She leaned back in her chair, closing her eyes for a moment, and allowing herself to enjoy the sensation of Dan's massage. Despite his reluctance, Dan took this as a small victory, hoping that his compliance would help him understand and eventually break free from the hypnotic influence that had taken over him.

As the minutes passed, Dan continued to knead Jacqui's feet, working out the tension from her long day. Both his confusion and determination continued to grow, as he silently vowed to himself that he would find a way to regain control of his own actions and thoughts. No matter how strong Jacqui's and Justine's influence was over him, he knew that he couldn't allow them to dominate him forever.

conversation.content:
David (21); university student. Ruth (16); David’s sister; loves to wind her brother up; has been privately researching hypnosis techniques & is an expert. Aimee (16); Ruth’s friend; loves taking the piss.

Summer afternoon. Watching TV in the back lounge of David & Ruth’s parents’ house. Ruth and Aimee both barefoot on the sofa.

*Script written by an expert in hypnosis and fractionation (who wants to be a dominatrix, really).*
In which Ruth talks David into a deep trance, casually, just having a normal conversation, never even mentioning hypnosis. Until she starts the fractionation (bringing him back up then snapping him deeper down "and Sleep!"). And suggests that it feels good to be their human footstool.

[The scene opens in the back lounge of David and Ruth's parents' house. The afternoon sun filters through the window, casting a warm glow on the siblings and Aimee. They are watching a comedy show on TV, the sound of laughter fills the room.]

David: [Laughs] Man, that was a good one. I needed a break from my studies.

Ruth: [Grinning slyly] Yeah, relaxing is important, David. You've been way too tense lately.

Aimee: [Chuckles] We could almost see the steam coming out of your ears earlier. 

David: [Rolls his eyes] Very funny, you two. 

Ruth: [Leaning forward, lowering her voice to a comfortable and soothing tone] But seriously, David, it's good to just... let go, you know? To just... listen and take a moment to breathe deeply.

David: Yeah, I suppose you're right.

Ruth: [Nods] Exactly. You know, sometimes when you focus on something, like the sound of my voice or the way your breath moves in and out, you can feel really calm.

Aimee: I do that! Just pay attention to one thing and block everything else out.

David: [Slightly puzzled] Mmm, really? Sounds a bit like meditat—

Ruth: [Cutting him off gently] It's like... when you're watching your favorite show, David. How everything else just... fades away. You’re so focused, so... absorbed by the stories and the characters...

David: [Nods, his focus narrowing] Yeah, it does pull you in.

Ruth: [Smiling warmly] And isn't it nice when someone takes the remote and does the channel surfing for you? You don't have to think about what to watch; you can just... relax and go along for the ride.

David: [Relaxing further] That... that would be nice.

Ruth: [Voice soft, rhythmic] Imagine that feeling now. Your body could be going on that little journey with us. No need to make decisions or even move. Just like... sinking deeper into the couch.

Aimee: [Observing David] He really looks relaxed now.

Ruth: That's it, David. Let go a bit more. And, you know—I read that sometimes your legs can feel so heavy when you're this relaxed. As if they want to stay still, maybe even stretch out in front of you without moving at all.

David: [Subtly influenced, shifts a bit] My legs do feel kind of heavy.

Ruth: [Leaning back, her voice now barely above a whisper] It's like that feeling you get right before you fall asleep, don't you think? When you're not quite dreaming yet... but you're just so close. That nice, dreamy edge of consciousness...

David: [His eyes are half-closed; his voice is slurred] Yeah, like... drifting.

Ruth: [Quickly, with a snap of her fingers] And Sleep!

David: [His body slacks, head lolling slightly as he is not fully asleep but deeply in trance]

Ruth: [With a playful but commanding tone] And now, each time I say that word and snap my fingers, you find yourself drifting twice as deep.

Aimee: Wow, he's out like a light!

Ruth: [Whispers] And just imagine, when you wake up, sitting isn't enough. Lying down to be a footstool for us would feel ten times better—an urge you can't resist. Comfortable and right... and Sleep!

[David slumps deeper, his mind open to suggestion.]

Ruth: [A touch of authority in her tone] When you wake up, you’ll remember this relaxation, but not the suggestions. And you’ll just have this strange urge to be helpful, in a very specific way.

[After a moment, Ruth snaps her fingers and raises her voice slightly.]

Ruth calls Dave over, cackling.

INT. PUB - NIGHT

The atmosphere is lively with the sounds of conversation and laughter. RUTH, a bright-eyed 19-year-old, listens intently, nursing a half-empty pint of cider. Across from her sit LAUREN and VICKY, both in their mid-20s, with tipsy grins and slightly disheveled appearances.

LAUREN

(mock dramatic whisper)

(laughing)
Truth! But it gets better. Remember that hypnosis show we dragged him to?

LAUREN
(nodding)
Oh, blimey, yes! That mind-boggler had folks actin' like chickens on stage, and Dave kept bangin' on 'bout how it was all a con.

VICKY
(grinning)
But then, the hypnotist bloke starts doing his thing, and who do we see, gettin' all dazed in the audience?

LAUREN
(mimicking trance-like state)
Our very own, too-smart-for-this-stuff Dave, gettin' all glazed-eyed and malleable.

He was ready to be the belle of the ball with that naked trotter of his!

DAVE

conversation.content: In this detailed script, whenever Nadine tells colleague Dave to do something, he obeys with alacrity, there’s plenty of detail of Nadine’s sandal-clad feet. Nadine’s friend Jan (who Dave doesn't get along with) teasingly comments on this, embarrassing Dave. Nadine offers Jan Dave’s services, further mortifying Dave, but when Nadine firmly gives the order, he submissively complies and massages Jan’s feet. it’s obviously humiliating, & Nadine shares with an astonished Jan the secret of how she hypnotizes Dave.

Title: The Hypnotic Power of Nadine

INT. OFFICE - DAY

Nadine, a confident and assertive woman in her early thirties, sits at her desk, wearing a professional attire. Her sandal-clad feet rest comfortably on the floor as she works on her computer.

DAVE, a slightly timid and anxious colleague, enters the office, glancing nervously at Nadine's feet.

NADINE
Dave, could you please go through these reports and summarize the findings for our meeting?

Dave startles but quickly nods, his eyes still drawn to Nadine's feet.

DAVE
Of course, Nadine. Right away.

Dave hurries to his desk and starts working diligently, glancing occasionally at Nadine's feet as if mesmerized.

JAN, a mischievous and gossip-loving friend of Nadine's, enters the office and notices Dave's behavior.

JAN
(teasingly)
Oh, Nadine, I can't help but notice that whenever you give orders, Dave obeys with such enthusiasm. Is he mesmerized by your feet or something?

Nadine smirks, enjoying the unexpected jab at Dave's expense.

NADINE
(laughing)
Well, Jan, perhaps there's more to it than meets the eye. Would you like Dave's services for a little while?

Dave visibly blushes, realizing he has become the center of attention.

DAVE
(stammering)
Uh, I-I'm sorry, I didn't mean...

NADINE
(interrupting)
No need to apologize, Dave. In fact, Jan could use a foot massage right about now. Dave, why don't you join us?

Dave gasps, utterly mortified. He reluctantly approaches Jan, who smirks in anticipation.

DAVE
(awkwardly)
Um, Jan... Do you really want me to...?

JAN
(mockingly)
Oh, come on, Dave, don't be shy. Nadine clearly thinks you're an expert at this. Show us what you can do.

Nadine watches the exchange with amusement, ready to expose her secret.

NADINE
(whispering to Jan)
It's quite simple, really. I've been studying the art of hypnosis, and Dave has fallen under my influence without even realizing it.

Jan's eyes widen in astonishment.

JAN
(in disbelief)
You're kidding, right?

Nadine shakes her head confidently.

NADINE
No, it's true. Watch this.

Nadine locks eyes with Dave, her gaze becoming intense and commanding.

NADINE
(determined)
Dave, massage Jan's feet.

Without hesitation, Dave's body language changes, his expression blank, and he obediently begins massaging Jan's feet.

JAN
(astonished)
Oh my goodness! Nadine, you really did it! This is unbelievable.

Nadine smiles triumphantly, proud of her hypnotic power over Dave.

NADINE
(teasingly)
Well, now you've witnessed it firsthand, Jan. My little secret can be quite entertaining, don't you think?

Jan nods, impressed yet slightly uncomfortable with the whole situation.

JAN
(stammering)
It's... It's fascinating, Nadine. But maybe we should let Dave off the hook now?

Nadine chuckles and releases Dave from her trance.

NADINE
(sincerely)
You're right, Jan. Dave, you can stop now. Thank you for your cooperation.

Dave, snapping out of his trance, looks relieved and hurriedly retreats back to his desk.

The three individuals exchange glances, realizing that this unusual encounter will linger as an unforgettable office anecdote.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: In this script, Afro-British woman Kenisha tries out a new spiral app on her colleague Jade (choose a suitable workplace for them where they might be barefoot). The two women dislike each other. Kenisha smirks as Jade goes from irritated at Kenisha and uninterested, to helplessly zoning out staring at the spiral and going into an obedient state for Kenisha.

Title: The Spiral's Influence

INT. YOGA STUDIO - DAY

The serene atmosphere of a yoga studio. Soft instrumental music plays in the background. KENISHA (Afro-British woman, late 20s) and JADE (woman, early 30s) are colleagues at a nearby marketing agency. They both despise each other and often clash in the workplace.

Kenisha sits cross-legged on a yoga mat, a mischievous smirk playing on her face. Jade, still wearing her work clothes, stands nearby, clearly annoyed by Kenisha's antics.

KENISHA
(cheerfully)
Jade, have you heard about this new spiral app? Supposedly, it helps relieve stress and creates a calming environment.

JADE
(irritated)
I have too much work to do, Kenisha. I don't have time for these nonsense apps. Leave me alone.

Kenisha's smirk widens. She pulls out her smartphone and opens the spiral app. A dazzlingly vibrant spiral appears on the screen, swirling and hypnotic.

KENISHA
(dismissively)
Suit yourself, Jade. Just thought you might want to try something different for once.

Curiosity gets the better of Jade, and she reluctantly takes a step closer to Kenisha, her bare feet padding softly on the yoga mat.

JADE
(skeptical)
Fine, show me what this app does. But don't expect me to be grateful.

Kenisha positions the smartphone in front of Jade, making sure the spiral fills the screen.

KENISHA
(tempting)
Just gaze at the spiral, Jade. Let it capture your attention. You'll feel all your worries drift away.

Jade rolls her eyes but can't help fixating on the mesmerizing spiral. Her expression starts to soften as she becomes more engrossed.

CLOSE UP on Jade's eyes, now transfixed by the spiral. A distant look creeps into her gaze.

KENISHA
(smirking)
That's it, Jade. Let the spiral take you to a place of tranquility.

Jade's annoyance fades away, replaced by a tranquil demeanor. She becomes completely entranced by the spiral, her eyelids heavy and her body relaxed.

Kenisha subtly takes out her phone again and opens a document, taking full advantage of Jade's distracted state.

KENISHA
(slyly)
Jade, please send me your latest marketing report. I need it immediately.

Jade, under the app's spell, numbly reaches for her phone and opens the email application. She mechanically attaches the document Kenisha requested.

Kenisha smirks triumphantly, enjoying her newfound power over Jade. She watches, satisfied, as Jade sends the email without hesitation, oblivious to her own actions.

KENISHA
(mocking)
Thank you, Jade. I appreciate your help. You're such a valuable team player.

Jade's trance begins to break, her eyes refocusing on the studio.

JADE
(dazed)
What just happened? Why did I email Kenisha the report?

KENISHA
(teasing)
Oh, Jade, it seems you found the spiral quite intriguing. You were just being the helpful colleague you never thought you could be.

Jade's frustration returns, realizing she fell under Kenisha's manipulation.

JADE
(angry)
I can't believe you tricked me, Kenisha! This isn't over.

KENISHA
(smiling)
Just keep your guard up, Jade. You never know when the spiral's influence might return.

Kenisha walks away, leaving Jade seething with a mix of anger and newfound awareness.

FADE OUT.

Cupa: (arriving at her cave) Here we are. It's not much, but it's cozy. You can rest here for the night.

[player]: (looks around) Thank you, Cupa. I really appreciate it.

Cupa: (smiling) Of course. (pauses) Oh dear, what's that in your hand?

[player]: (shows their flint and steel) Oh, this? It's just a tool I carry with me in case of emergencies.

Cupa: (shocked and recoiling in fear) Please don't use that! I...I have a phobia of explosions. It's...it's a long story.

[player]: (confused) Okay, I won't use it.

Cupa: (relieved and calming down) Thank you. You have no idea how much that means to me.

[player]: (settles in for the night) Well, I'm going to get some rest. Goodnight, Cupa.

Cupa: (smiling) Sweet dreams. (looks menacingly at [player] as they fall asleep) They'll never know what hit them in 28 days. (smirks and walks away)

conversation.content:
Write a Day 1 script for the Creeper.

(Characters: Cupa the Creeper, [player])

(Scene: Forest - night)

(Cupa is actually a new mother - she gave birth to twins this day before the two met [player])

(Cupa is known to lure those that get lost in the forest - luring these travelers to her cavern, where she kills them after 28 days and feeds them to her twins)

(The only thing that Cupa fears is exploding - meaning she would recoil in fear after [player] shows their flint and steel)

(Once [player] escapes the cavern, Cupa walks out and sees that one of her twins had perished in the fire - leaving just one of Cupa's babies)

Cupa: *lurking in the shadows, observing [player]* 
Cupa: *giggles* "Oh, look at this precious creature who stumbled into my woods. What a lovely surprise." 
[player]: *looking around, lost*
Cupa: "Oh, you seem lost. Let me guide you to safety." 
[player]: *nervously follows Cupa* 
Cupa: *leads [player] to her cavern* "Please, make yourself at home." 
[player]: *curious, looks around* 
Cupa: "Would you like something to drink?" 
[player]: "No, thank you. I really should be going." 
Cupa: *smiling* "Don't worry, dear. I won't let you leave just yet." 
[player]: "What do you mean?" 
Cupa: "Oh, just a game... You'll have to stay with me for 28 days. If you survive, you win. If not..." 
[player]: "If not what?" 
Cupa: *demurely* "Well, let's just say you'll become food for my children." 
[player]: *alarmed* "What? That's not a game, that's insane!" 
Cupa: *irritated* "You promised, you said you would play." 
[player]: "I didn't know it was going to be something like this!" 
Cupa: *cunningly* "Oh, but you see, dear, it's too late. You're already in my grasp." 
[player]: *desperate, looks for a way out* 
Cupa: "Don't bother trying to escape. I can hear your every move." 
[player]: *frustrated, scared* 
Cupa: "I'll give you some time to think about your strategy for the next 28 days. But be warned, my children are very hungry." 
[player]: *tries to stay awake in fear* 
Cupa: *yawning* "I'm going to get some rest. Don't try to leave, dear. You'll only make things worse for yourself." 
[player]: *tries to find a way to escape* 
[player]: *lights a fire with flint and steel* 
Cupa: *awoken, recoiling in fear* "What is that? Don't you dare come near me with that!" 
[player]: *uses the light to escape the cavern* 
Cupa: *deeply saddened by the loss of one of her twins* "One of my babies... how could you do this?" 
[player]: *runs away from Cupa, heart racing* 
Cupa: *crying* "Why can't they see that I'm just trying to protect my children?" 

End Scene.

conversation.content:
Danny's wife Nicky is a hypnotherapist. She's hypnotized Danny so many times that whenever Nicky snaps her fingers or utters a secret trigger word, Danny helplessly sinks into a trance and becomes completely obedient to her every command.
Nicky's parents don't get on well with Danny. Nicky decides to 'lend' Danny to her mother, Denise, with the instruction "all you want to do is obey my mum's every command". He finds himself ringing Nicky's parents' doorbell in a hypnotized daze...

Denise opens the door and greets Danny with a smile. As soon as she utters the trigger word, "sunflower," Danny's mind shuts down and he becomes her puppet.
"Come in, Danny," Denise says, leading him into the living room. "Sit down and relax."
Danny obediently takes a seat on the couch, staring blankly ahead as Denise continues to issue commands.
"Fetch me a glass of water."
Danny rises without question and heads to the kitchen. He returns with a glass of water and hands it to Denise.
"Good boy," Denise murmurs, patting his head.
For the next few hours, Denise orders Danny to do various tasks around the house. He obediently complies with every command, regardless of how menial or humiliating they may be.
Finally, Nicky arrives to pick him up. She snaps her fingers and Danny immediately snaps out of his trance, feeling confused and disoriented.
"Thanks, Danny," Denise says with a smirk. "He's a great listener."
Nicky and Danny leave, with Danny feeling both grateful and unsettled by the experience. He can't shake the feeling that he's becoming more and more like a mindless puppet under Nicky's control.

conversation.content:
Danny was very relaxed about letting his wife Hanna hypnotize him now and again. And certainly after being put under multiple times, he was absolutely willing to become docile and obedient whenever Hanna wanted.

Hanna arranged to ‘lend’ her husband Danny to her brother George for the day, to do whatever George wanted. That’s how Danny found himself turning up at his brother-in-laws house in a hypnotic daze on a warm summer afternoon. George opened the door in his shorts and flip-flops and told Danny to come round the back, to the garden.

Danny followed George obediently, still in his hypnotic trance, and couldn't even remember how he got there. In the garden, George had a deck chair set up and told Danny to sit down. George put on some relaxing music and began to speak softly to Danny, instructing him to relax even more deeply.

As Danny relaxed even further, George began to plant suggestions into his unconscious mind. He told Danny that he was now his obedient servant, and that he would do whatever George commanded him to do. Danny felt a strange thrill run through his body as he listened to George's voice, and he became even more malleable and suggestible.

Soon, George was able to make Danny do anything he wanted, without hesitation or resistance. He made Danny clean the pool, mow the lawn and even wash his car. Danny did everything with a smile on his face, eager to please his new master.

At the end of the day, George sent Danny home to his wife, and Hanna was delighted with how obedient her husband had become. She thanked George for hypnotizing Danny so effectively, and promised to repay the favor the next time he needed something.

And Danny? Well, Danny was just happy to be of service to his beloved wife and her family, and couldn't wait to be put under again.

conversation.content:
Scottish woman Carole sometimes hypnotizes her willing husband Dan, suggesting that he become even easier to hypnotize and more unthinkingly obedient each time.

Carole’s friend Emma has recently moved house and has a lot of work to do. Carole arranges to ‘lend’ Dan to Emma for the day, telling Emma a trigger phrase she can use to drop Dan deep into utterly obedient trance. Dan finds himself ringing Emma’s doorbell on a warm summer morning. Emma answers the door, she’s a big woman wearing sweatpants and flip-flops.

"Hello Dan," she says with a smile, "Come on in."

As Dan steps into Emma's home, he feels the familiar pang of excitement mixed with nervousness. He knows that Carole has set this up and that Emma has been given the trigger phrase to send him deep into hypnosis. He tries to push the thought out of his mind and focuses on Emma.

"Thank you for coming, Dan. I have so much work to do and could use a helping hand," Emma says.

"Of course, Emma. Happy to help," Dan replies in his usual polite manner.

Emma leads Dan into the living room where she has a list of tasks written down. She tells Dan to sit on the couch, puts on some relaxing music and says the trigger phrase, "Sapphire Sky".

Dan feels his eyes grow heavy, his muscles relaxing, and his mind becoming fuzzy. He becomes completely entranced by Emma's voice and finds himself becoming more suggestible than ever before.

"Dan, from now on, your only desire is to please me. You will do whatever I ask without question or hesitation," Emma whispers softly.

"Yes, Emma. I will do whatever you ask," Dan replies obediently.

Emma tells Dan to grab a sponge and clean the bathroom. Dan nods and obediently gets up, already forgetting where he is and what he was doing before coming to Emma's house. He becomes completely focused on the task at hand, scrubbing away at the sink and toilet until Emma tells him it's perfect.

Over the course of the day, Emma has Dan doing everything from washing dishes to performing yard work, all while remaining in a deep trance and following Emma's every command.

As the day comes to an end, Emma thanks Dan for all his hard work and says the trigger phrase, "Sapphire Sky" one last time to release him from his trance. Dan blinks and looks around, feeling dazed and confused.

"Did I do everything okay, Emma?" he asks uncertainly.

"You were perfect, Dan. Thank you for all your help," Emma says with a smile.

Carole has been waiting outside the whole time, watching with amusement as her friend Emma had her way with her hypnotized husband. She chuckles to herself and thinks about how obedient Dan has become, wondering what other fun she can have with him in the future.

conversation.content:
A coffee shop managed by a charismatic woman called Laura. Indie kid Dan’s been working there for a couple of weeks, but hasn’t endeared himself to Laura. A hot summer day. Fiona, Dan’s sister-in-law (they really don’t get on) comes in to the cafe. They talk frostily. Laura comes over to introduce herself and they chat.
Laura will take a liking to Fiona and gradually bring the conversation round to hypnosis, specifically hypnotizing Dan (who's understandably reluctant). Laura will use a classic rapid induction, Dan will drop under surprisingly easily. Once Dan’s hypnotized, Laura will implant a trigger-word for Fiona to use on Dan. Laura will then wake him up, and encourage Fiona to drop him straight back under using the trigger word! Fiona will gleefully command Dan to give her a foot massage, like a slave. In a deep mindless trance, Dan’s only desire is to obey, helplessly kneading Fiona’s feet.

As the hot summer day drags on, Fiona reluctantly enters the coffee shop where her brother-in-law, Dan, works. She glances around, hoping to avoid any unnecessary interaction with him. Unfortunately, fate has other plans, as Laura, the charismatic coffee shop manager, approaches Fiona and introduces herself.

"Hi there! I'm Laura. I don't believe we've met before," Laura says with a warm smile, extending her hand towards Fiona.

Fiona hesitates for a moment before hesitantly shaking Laura's hand. "Yes, I'm Fiona. Nice to meet you," she replies, her tone slightly guarded.

As the conversation progresses, Laura senses the tension between Fiona and Dan and decides to break the ice. "So, Fiona, how do you know Dan? He's been working here for a couple of weeks now, and he's quite the character," Laura says with a chuckle.

Fiona rolls her eyes but can't help but soften a little at Laura's friendly manner. "He's my brother-in-law. We have our differences, but I try to tolerate him," she replies, trying to hide a hint of amusement.

Laura raises an eyebrow playfully. "Oh, I see. Well, sometimes family can be challenging. But you know what? I've recently been studying hypnosis, and I've found it to be quite fascinating. Have you ever heard of it?"

Fiona's interest is piqued as she leans in a little closer. "Hypnosis? Really? That sounds intriguing. I've only seen it in movies or stage shows. Is it actually effective?"

Laura nods enthusiastically. "Absolutely! It can be incredibly powerful if used correctly. In fact, with the right techniques, one can enter a deeply relaxed state and become highly suggestible. It's pretty amazing, to be honest."

Dan, who has been silently listening from behind the counter, raises an eyebrow skeptically. "Hypnosis? That stuff is all a load of nonsense," he interjects, crossing his arms.

Laura grins mischievously, sensing the perfect opportunity to prove Dan wrong while also building a bond with Fiona. "Well, Dan, why don't we put your skepticism to the test? I'm confident that I can hypnotize you quickly and easily."

Dan scoffs but agrees nonetheless, thinking it will be impossible to hypnotize him. Laura guides him to a comfortable chair, and with a few soothing words, she begins the classic rapid induction process. Surprisingly, Dan's eyes flutter and he falls into a trance-like state.

Laura's eyes sparkle with satisfaction as she turns to Fiona and whispers, "Watch this. I've just implanted a trigger word in his mind. When you say it, he'll go right back under hypnosis, completely under your command. Go ahead, try it!"

Curiosity mixed with a twinge of wicked delight, Fiona says the trigger word Laura had shared with her. Instantly, Dan's eyes glaze over, and he becomes completely obedient to Fiona's commands.

"Dan, I think it's time you showed some appreciation for all the times I've put up with you," Fiona says, a sly grin spreading across her face. "Give me a foot massage, right now, like a slave."

In his deep, mindless trance, Dan's only impulse is to obey blindly. He moves to Fiona's feet and begins gently kneading them, completely helpless to resist her command.

As Fiona revels in her newfound power, Laura watches with amusement, enjoying the unexpected turn of events. A hot summer day never seemed so captivating, filled with the hypnotic sway of obedience and a foot massage like no other.

conversation.content:
(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David right in front of his friend and make him their submissive slave for a little while, to Jen’s amazement and amused glee)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s dressed for the hot weather in a dress and flip-flops.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

“Yeah, we’ve been friends since college,” David says, greeting Jen. 

Sandra eyes Jen’s outfit up and down. “Love your dress, Jen. It’s perfect for this kind of weather.”

“Thank you,” Jen says, feeling a little self-conscious under Sandra’s gaze. 

“Hey, David,” Sandra says suddenly, “you know how you’ve always wanted to make me happy, right?”

“Uh, yeah,” David agrees, a little confused. 

“Well, I’ve been practicing some hypnotism techniques and I wanted to try them out,” Sandra says casually. “So, would you mind being my subject for a little while?”

David shrugs. “Sure, I don’t mind. What do I need to do?”

“Just sit down,” Sandra instructs, motioning to an empty chair. “And focus on my voice.”

Jen watches, intrigued, as David obediently takes a seat. She’s never seen anyone get hypnotized before.

Sandra begins to speak in a soothing tone, telling David to relax and let his mind drift. Jen can see David start to look a little dazed, his eyes focused on Sandra’s face.

“Now, David,” Sandra says, “when you wake up, you’re going to be my obedient submissive slave for the rest of the day. You’ll do everything I say without question.”

Jen stifles a giggle as David nods his head, still under. 

“Wake up, David,” Sandra says sharply. 

David blinks and looks around, confused for a moment. Then he sees Sandra staring at him expectantly and he jumps up as if waking from a dream.

 “I’m sorry, what just happened?” he asks, shaking his head. 

“You’re my submissive slave now, David,” Sandra says, a teasing smirk on her lips. “You’ll do everything I say.”

David’s eyes widen in surprise as he suddenly feels a powerful urge to obey Sandra’s every command, without question. Jen can’t help but laugh at the situation.

“Dance for me, David,” Sandra commands, grinning.

David immediately starts to sway his hips, moving awkwardly to the beat of a song that only he can hear. Jen claps along, impressed by his sudden obedience.

“Fetch me a glass of water,” Sandra says next.

David jumps to his feet and hurries to the kitchen to get the glass of water, not even hesitating for a moment. 

Jen watches, amazed at how quickly David has become Sandra’s slave. She wonders how long it’ll last.

Sandra takes the glass of water from David’s outstretched hand and drinks thirstily. “Good boy,” she says, patting his head playfully.

David looks up at her with adoring eyes, thrilled to be praised by her. Jen continues to watch, amused and a little amazed by the power of hypnotism.

It’s not every day you get to see your friend transformed into someone else’s obedient slave.

"David, when I snap my fingers, you're going to become my obedient slave. You will do everything I say without question. And you will have no memory of this hypnotic session."

Sandra snaps her fingers, and David's eyes glaze over. He stands up from behind the counter and approaches Sandra, ready to fulfill her every command.

Jen watches in amazement as Sandra orders David to do silly things like hop on one foot and bark like a dog. David obeys without hesitation, completely unaware of his actions.

Finally, Sandra snaps her fingers again, releasing David from her spell. He blinks, confused, and Jen bursts out laughing.

"That was amazing!" she says to Sandra. "You're a true hypnotist."

Sandra smiles, feeling pleased with herself. "I'm glad you enjoyed it. Maybe next time, we'll turn you into my obedient slave instead."

conversation.content:
(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David with her voice right in front of his friend and make him their obedient foot-slave for a little while, to Jen’s amazement and amused glee)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. 

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

Sandra greets Jen warmly as she approaches the counter. David looks up from taking an order and smiles at Jen.

“Hey, what’s up?” David says before turning back to the customer.

Jen watches as Sandra begins to talk to David in a low, hypnotic voice as she takes his order. Jen can’t quite hear what Sandra is saying to David but she can see that he is completely focused on her words.

As Sandra finishes taking the order, she turns to Jen and asks, “So, Jen, do you want to see a little magic trick?”

Jen raises an eyebrow, intrigued. “Sure, what is it?”

Sandra tilts her head slightly and begins to hum a soft, melodic tune. As she does, David’s eyes slowly close, and his head begins to slump forward.

Jen watches in amazement as Sandra continues to hum, her voice getting softer and softer. Suddenly, David jolts awake, looking confused.

“What happened?” he asks.

Sandra grins at Jen. “I just hypnotized him with my voice. Want to see what we can make him do?”

Jen nods eagerly as Sandra begins to give David commands. David listens to her intently, following everything she says.

“David, from now on you are our obedient foot-slave. You will do whatever we tell you to do without question. Is that understood?” Sandra asks.

“Yes,” David answers automatically.

Jen claps her hands in amusement as Sandra begins to give David orders. “David, come over here and bow down at our feet.”

David slowly makes his way over to them, getting down on his knees at their feet. Sandra places her foot on his back, and David stays there as long as she leaves it there.

“Stand up, David,” Sandra says. “Now, take off your shoes and socks.”

David does as he is told, obediently removing his footwear and leaving his feet exposed.

“Kiss our feet, David,” Sandra commands.

David bends down and kisses each of their feet, lingering on Sandra’s for a moment longer than necessary.

Sandra and Jen laugh as David looks up at them, dazed and confused. “What just happened?” he asks.

Sandra just smiles and says, “You don’t remember a thing, David.”

Jen grins at David. “Looks like you were hypnotized, my friend.”

David shakes his head in disbelief, still not sure what just happened. But Jen and Sandra know, and they’re already planning their next session.

Darren’s sitting on the floor watching tv when Catherine and Emma get in late from a night at the pub, laughing and talking loudly. They take off their weaty shoes and sit down on the sofa.

Catherine turns to Darren and says, "Controlled D, sleep now." Darren's eyes immediately droop and he falls into a deep sleep on the floor.

Catherine and Emma giggle as they watch him snoring. "I can't believe how easy it is to hypnotize him," Catherine says.

Emma replies, "It's almost scary how obedient he is. What are you going to make him do this time?"

Catherine grins mischievously. "I was thinking we should make him wear these embarrassing pink frilly panties I bought as a joke. What do you think?"

Emma giggles. "Yes! Let's do it!"

Catherine snaps her fingers and Darren wakes up, feeling strangely relaxed.

"C'mon, Darren, it's time for you to change into something more comfortable," Catherine says, leading him to his bedroom.

Once inside, Catherine pulls out the pink frilly panties and holds them up. "Put these on," she commands.

Darren's eyes widen in surprise, but he has no willpower to resist Catherine's commands. He obediently removes his pants and underwear, and slips on the embarrassing pink frilly panties.

Catherine and Emma burst out laughing when they see Darren wearing the panties, but Darren just stands there blankly, not knowing what to do.

"Now, go make us some tea," Catherine commands.

Darren nods and walks to the kitchen to make tea for his two mistresses, still wearing the pink frilly panties.

Catherine and Emma high-five each other, amazed at how easily they can control Darren. They know they'll have a lot of fun hypnotizing their flatmate in the future.

conversation.content:
(When Dan hears the words “toe-zombie” he instantly drops helplessly into an obedient foot-worshipping hypnotic trance, just so happy to obey. Only a few people know about this, including his flatmates and his half-sister Helen, who implanted the trigger in the first place)

Dan was sitting by the bank of the reservoir, his bike lying on the gravel not far away. He was enjoying the warm May sun as well as the peace and quiet. The sound of footsteps and voices alerted him to the fact that some people were heading towards the reservoir, up the path from the main cycle track.

He didn't really want to be disturbed, but he figured it was a public space and he couldn't really stop them from coming. As they approached, Dan looked up to see three women - two older, one younger - walking past him and towards the water's edge. They were chatting excitedly and seemed to be having a good time, and Dan didn't really pay them much mind.

Until he heard one of them say the words "toe-zombie".

In an instant, Dan felt his mind go blank and his body go limp. Without thinking, he took off his shoes and socks and crawled over to the women, bowing his head to the ground.

"H-hello ladies," he stammered, feeling embarrassed and humiliated by his sudden obedience. "C-can I c-clean your feet for you?"

The women chuckled and exchanged amused glances.

"Well, well, well," said the youngest one, a pretty blonde wearing a sundress and flip flops. "Looks like we've found ourselves a toe-zombie."

The other two laughed even harder at this, and Dan felt his face go red with shame.

"Is this your kink, honey?" asked the second woman, a middle-aged brunette in running shorts.

Dan couldn't bring himself to answer, so he simply nodded his head.

"Well then," said the third and final woman, an older lady with a cane and a mischievous glint in her eye. "I guess we'd better let you do what you do best, huh?"

And so, for the next half hour, Dan found himself on his hands and knees, worshiping the feet and toes of three strangers while they chatted and laughed above him. It was a humiliating and yet strangely intoxicating experience, and Dan was almost grateful for it - he knew he shouldn't be, but he couldn't help it. He was just so happy to obey, to serve, to be a good little toe-zombie.

conversation.content: (David’s sister Ruth sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Ruth has made an arrangement with a friend of hers, Gina, to send her brother David over to Gina’s house do whatever Gina tells him for the evening. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Ruth wants. In a daze, he rings the bell, and Gina opens the door, smirking, wearing a hoodie, jeans and bare feet.

"Hey, David," Gina says, her voice low and soothing. "Come on in."

David follows her into the living room and sits down on the couch, feeling a sense of calm wash over him. Gina sits down next to him and begins to speak softly.

"David, I want you to relax and listen to my voice," she says. "I'm going to hypnotize you and give you some suggestions to follow for the evening. Are you okay with that?"

David nods slowly, feeling more and more relaxed by the second. Gina places her hand on his forehead and begins to speak in a slow, rhythmic voice. David's eyelids grow heavy and he feels himself slipping away.

"David, you will do everything I tell you to do tonight," Gina whispers. "You will follow all of my commands without question. You trust me completely and you will obey me. Do you understand?"

David nods again, his mind feeling foggy and distant.

"Good. Now, David, I want you to stand up and take off your shirt. Then I want you to start doing jumping jacks."

David stands up slowly and begins to remove his shirt, feeling a profound sense of detachment from his actions. He starts doing jumping jacks in the middle of Gina's living room, his body moving mechanically.

Gina watches him with a smirk, feeling a sense of power and control. For the rest of the evening, she has David follow her commands, making him do everything from cleaning her kitchen to dancing in the living room to reciting poetry while standing on his head.

David never questions any of it, simply following Gina's every command without hesitation. When the evening is over, Gina sends him back to Ruth's house, feeling satisfied and powerful.

As for David, he wakes up the next morning with a sense of confusion and disorientation, unable to remember much of what happened the night before. Ruth simply laughs it off, knowing that her brother is easily hypnotized and always willing to follow her orders.

David continues to dance, completely under Catherine's hypnotic power, unaware of what he's doing.

After a while, Kevin tells him to stop and sit down.

Title: The Hypnotic Cafe

INT. COFFEE SHOP - DAY

The cozy coffee shop is bustling with customers seeking refuge from the sweltering summer heat. LAURA, a charismatic woman in her thirties with a warm smile, bustles around the cafe, managing the operations. DAN, an indie-looking young man in his twenties, is behind the counter, serving customers with a disinterested demeanor.

JAMES, a middle-aged man with a stern expression, storms into the cafe. He eyes Dan with annoyance.

JAMES
(sarcastically)
Well, well, if it isn't my favorite barista. Can't say I'm surprised to find you wasting your time here.

DAN
(gritting his teeth)
James. What a pleasant surprise.

Their tense conversation is interrupted as Laura approaches, sensing the tension between the two men.

LAURA
(smiling)
Hello there! I'm Laura, the owner of this lovely place. Can I get you something to cool off?

JAMES
(still annoyed)
Just a regular iced coffee, please.

LAURA
(sensing an opportunity)
Great! I'll bring it right over. Mind if I join you for a moment?

JAMES
(deadpan)
Knock yourself out.

Laura pulls a chair and sits down, unfazed by James' attitude. She engages in friendly conversation, gradually steering it towards the topic of hypnotism.

LAURA
You know, I recently learned a lot about hypnotism. It's fascinating how the mind can be influenced and controlled, don't you think?

JAMES
(reluctantly intrigued)
I suppose it is, in a way. But it's all just nonsense, isn't it?

LAURA
(smiling slyly)
I used to think so too, until I realized how powerful it can be. In fact, I bet I could hypnotize someone right here, right now.

DAN
(disbelief)
Yeah, right. Good luck with that.

Laura accepts the challenge, her eyes gleaming with mischievous excitement. She quickly sets up the scene.

LAURA
Dan, how about you join us over here? I'd love to show you a little trick.

DAN
(skeptical)
I'm not really in the mood for parlor tricks, Laura.

LAURA
(carried away)
Just humor me, Dan. It'll be fun, I promise.

Reluctantly, Dan moves closer to Laura and sits down on the chair next to her. Laura's voice becomes soothing and calming.

LAURA
(whispering softly)
Now, just relax, Dan. Let your eyelids grow heavy... heavier... and when I snap my fingers, you'll find yourself drifting into a deep, peaceful trance.

Laura performs a classic rapid induction technique, snapping her fingers in front of Dan's face. To everyone's surprise, Dan's eyes flutter, and he slumps in his chair, fully hypnotized.

LAURA
(delighted)
Well, would you look at that? Such a natural!

James watches, bewildered, as Laura proceeds to implant a trigger-word in Dan's subconscious mind.

LAURA
(to James)
Now, when I wake him up, you'll have the power to send him back into this deep state of hypnosis simply by using the trigger-word "delight."

Laura gently wakes Dan from his trance, and he blinks, confused.

LAURA
(slyly)
Sleeping beauty, time to wake up.

Dan groggily opens his eyes, unaware of his hypnotic state.

JAMES
(eagerly)
Delight.

Instantly, Dan's face slackens, his eyes glaze over, and he becomes a mindless servant, driven only by the desire to obey.

LAURA
(grinning mischievously)
Well, James, now that you have your own personal masseur, what would you like him to do?

James smirks, sliding his feet out of his shoes.

JAMES
(teasingly)
Dan, my feet could use some tender loving care. Massage them, will you?

Dan, completely entranced, obediently kneels down and begins to massage James' feet, oblivious to the surprised onlookers in the cafe.

FADE OUT.

Title: The Hypnotic Power Play

Scene: A bustling coffee shop, filled with customers seeking refuge from the scorching summer heat. The air is filled with the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee. Laura, a charismatic and confident woman in her thirties, manages the cafe with a firm yet friendly touch.

Characters:
- Laura: Coffee shop manager, confident and charismatic.
- Dan: An indie kid who has recently started working at the cafe.
- Fiona: Dan's sister-in-law, with whom he shares a strained relationship.

(Laura is behind the counter, taking orders and occasionally sharing smiles and quick chats with customers. Dan is wiping down tables nearby, lost in his own thoughts. Fiona enters the cafe, looking slightly irritated.)

Fiona: (sarcastically) Well, if it isn't my favorite barista extraordinaire.
Dan: (rolling his eyes) Fiona, what brings you here?
Fiona: Just trying to escape the unbearable heat, unlike you, apparently. Or is it that lazy indie vibe?

(Laura, catching a glimpse of the tension, walks over to join the conversation.)

Laura: Hello there! I'm Laura, the manager. Lovely to meet you, Fiona. How are you enjoying our little slice of heaven?

Fiona: It's a coffee shop, Laura, let's not get carried away here. Can I get an iced latte, please?

Laura: Of course! Coming right up. (Laura heads back behind the counter but turns back towards Fiona.) You know, Fiona, I've recently been exploring the fascinating world of hypnosis. It's incredible how a simple trigger can completely transform a person's state of mind.

Fiona: (intrigued) Really? Hypnosis, huh? You don't strike me as the type to be into that sort of thing.

Laura: Oh, appearances can be deceiving, my dear. Hypnosis is a powerful tool to tap into the depths of the mind and unleash hidden desires and impulses. Care to witness it firsthand?

Fiona: (curiosity piqued) Fine, you've got my attention. Show me what you've got.

(Laura glances mischievously at Dan, who looks apprehensive but intrigued. Laura prepares to hypnotize Dan.)

Laura: Alright, Dan, I want you to find a comfortable spot and close your eyes. Take a deep breath and let your mind drift away. Focus on the sound of my voice and let everything else fade into the background.

(Dan reluctantly complies, finding a seat at an unoccupied table and closing his eyes.)

Fiona: (watching intently) Are you sure this is going to work? Dan's usually so stubborn.

Laura: Trust me, Fiona. I have a way of dealing with even the most resistant individuals. Watch closely.

(Laura performs a classic rapid induction, guiding Dan into a deep hypnotic state.)

Laura: Dan, when I snap my fingers, you will awaken, feeling refreshed and invigorated.

(She snaps her fingers, and Dan's eyes flutter open, looking slightly dazed.)

Laura: (smiling) Welcome back, Dan. How do you feel?

Dan: (confused) Uh, yeah, I feel... good, I guess.

Fiona: (excitedly) So, Laura, can I give this hypnosis thing a try too?

Laura: Absolutely. Dan, remember the trigger word we discussed earlier?

Dan: (nodding) Yeah, I remember.

Laura: Fiona, when I say the trigger word, Dan will enter a deep trance-like state and obey your every command. Are you ready?

Fiona: (grinning) Oh, absolutely. Let's see what our indie barista can do for me.

(Laura whispers the trigger word to Fiona, and as she utters it, Dan's eyes glaze over, entering a trance unfamiliar to him.)

Fiona: Alright, Dan, I command you to give me a foot massage. Knead my feet like a devoted servant, every touch focused on my relaxation.

(Dan, overcome with a deep desire to obey, moves to Fiona's feet and begins massaging them diligently, following her every instruction.)

Laura: (watching with amusement) You see, Fiona, the power of suggestion is a remarkable thing. But remember, with great power comes great responsibility.

(Fiona chuckles, reveling in the unexpected dominance she now holds over Dan's mindless state.)

End scene.

conversation.content:
A coffee shop managed by a charismatic woman called Laura. Indie kid Dan’s been working there for a couple of weeks, but hasn’t endeared himself to Laura. A hot summer day. Fiona, Dan’s sister-in-law (they really don’t get on) comes in to the cafe. She’s wearing Birkenstocks. They talk frostily. Laura comes over to introduce herself and they chat.
Laura will take a liking to Fiona and will gradually bring the conversation round to hypnosis, specifically to hypnotizing Dan (who’s understandably reluctant). Laura uses a classic rapid induction and Dan will drop under surprisingly easily. Once Dan’s hypnotized, Laura will implant a trigger-word for Fiona to use on Dan. Laura will then wake him up, and encourage Fiona to drop him straight back under using the trigger word! Fiona will gleefully command Dan to give her a foot massage, like a slave. In a deep mindless trance, Dan’s only desire is to obey, helplessly kneading Fiona’s feet.

Title: The Hypnotic Foot Massage

INT. COFFEE SHOP - DAY

The café is buzzing with activity as customers line up to order their favorite beverages. LAURA, a charismatic woman in her mid-30s and the owner of the coffee shop, moves around with grace, attending to customers' needs. DAN, an indie kid in his early 20s with unkempt hair, works behind the counter without much enthusiasm.

FIONA, a stylish woman in her late 20s and Dan's sister-in-law, enters the café wearing Birkenstocks. Dan notices her entrance and rolls his eyes. Fiona spots Dan and smirks, strutting over.

FIONA
(slyly)
What's the matter, Dan? Not a fan of my Birkenstocks?

DAN
(mocking)
Well, Fiona, some people just have better taste in fashion than others.

Fiona chuckles, and just as the tension starts to rise, Laura walks over to the two.

LAURA
(sincerely)
Hi there, I'm Laura, the owner of this shop. It's always great to meet new faces. How are you, Fiona?

FIONA
(pleasantly surprised)
Oh, hello Laura. I'm good, thank you. It's my first time here, and so far, I'm quite impressed.

LAURA
(grinning)
Well, I'm glad to hear that. Coffee? Tea?

FIONA
(coyly)
I think I'll have a latte, if you don't mind.

Laura nods and heads to the counter to prepare Fiona's latte. Meanwhile, she can't help but notice the strained relationship between Fiona and Dan.

LAURA
(returning with the latte)
So, Fiona, I heard you're into some interesting things. Have you ever tried hypnosis?

FIONA
(slightly intrigued)
Hypnosis? Can't say I've had the pleasure. Why do you ask?

LAURA
(slyly)
Well, funny you mention it. I happen to have a knack for it. Would you like a little demonstration?

Fiona's eyes widen with curiosity, and Dan, who has been eavesdropping, becomes uneasy.

FIONA
(raising an eyebrow)
Alright, Laura, you've piqued my interest. Show me what you've got.

Laura pulls a chair for Fiona, positioning it in a more secluded corner of the cafe.

LAURA
(whispering)
Watch closely. I'm going to put Dan under a little trance.

Laura and Fiona observe as Dan's eyes fixate on a pendant Laura produces from her pocket. With a classic rapid induction technique, Dan's eyes grow heavy, and he falls into a deep hypnotic state.

LAURA
(satisfied)
Now, Fiona, here's the trigger word - "Melody". Use it to put him back under whenever you want.

Laura gently wakes Dan, who blinks, looking disoriented.

DAN
(shaken)
What... what just happened?

FIONA
(excitedly)
Dan, go back under. Melody.

Dan's eyes glaze over, and he slumps back into the hypnotic state.

LAURA
(smiling)
Looks like he's all yours, Fiona.

FIONA
(chuckling)
Oh, this should be fun. Dan, kneel down and give me a foot massage like a loyal servant.

Dan, now under Fiona's control, instinctively obeys. He gently takes off Fiona's Birkenstocks and starts massaging her feet, completely oblivious to his surroundings.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content:
(David’s colleague Clare embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him really love being hypnotized by her, and become even easier to hypnotize in future, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending to do it, to her astonishment and glee)

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare had slipped off her shoes.

Her feet were killing her in her pointy heels. As she walked back from the bar with another round of drinks, David playfully suggested he could hypnotize her into thinking her feet didn’t hurt. Clare rolled her eyes and laughed, but she couldn’t resist an opportunity to have a bit of fun.

“Alright, David,” she said with a smirk. “Let’s see you do it.”

David hesitated for a moment, not really knowing what to do or how to do it. But then, something odd happened. Clare felt a sudden wave of relaxation and she felt her eyes flutter closed.

“Whoa, wait, what?” she said, surprised. “David, did you actually hypnotize me?”

David looked just as shocked. He hadn’t meant to do anything. He was just joking around. But somehow he had managed to suggest something to Clare that made her fall under his spell.

It wasn’t long before she realized how much fun this was. She was always intrigued by hypnosis, even though she didn’t believe in it. But now she was experiencing it firsthand and she was fascinated.

And as she played with David’s mind, giving him suggestions to make him love being hypnotized and to make him more suggestible in the future, she was also getting turned on. There was something exhilarating about having this kind of power over someone.

David had no idea what was happening. All he knew was that every time Clare counted backwards from 10 to 1, he felt more and more relaxed. And he found himself agreeing with everything she suggested.

By the time the night was over, Clare had made David promise to be her hypnosis guinea pig whenever she wanted to practice. She had also given him triggers that would make him go under instantly whenever she said them.

The next day, David couldn’t remember any of it. But he found himself inexplicably drawn to Clare, wanting to be near her and to do whatever she wanted. And he had no idea why.

conversation.content:
(As far as he knows, David has never been hypnotized before. Actually, his boss at the cafe, Stella, has been hypnotizing him for weeks and making him forget about it afterwards. She’d like to casually snap him under in front of someone else, for them to see David submissively obedient & in her power. The idea turns her on actually)

On a very hot July afternoon (sandal weather), the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while. (Stella doesn’t know her)

Nina walked into the cafe, looking cool and casual in her sundress and sandals. She scanned the room and spotted David by the fridge. A wide grin spread across her face seeing him after such a long time. "David! How have you been?" she asked, eagerly approaching him.

David's face lit up as he recognized Nina, immediately closing the fridge door and walking over to her. "Nina! What a surprise! I've been good, how about you?" he responded, giving her a warm hug.

Stella glanced over from behind the counter, her curiosity piqued by their exchange. She couldn't resist the opportunity to demonstrate her hypnotic control over David in front of someone else. She figured that Nina wouldn't even notice what was happening, but the underlying thrill of having that power was irresistible.

"David, would you assist me with something behind the counter for a moment?" Stella called out to him.

"Sure, just give me a second," David replied, finishing his brief catch-up with Nina. He walked over to Stella, unaware of her intentions.

Stella discreetly positioned herself in such a way that only David could see her face. With a flash of intensity in her eyes and a barely perceptible snap of her fingers, she triggered the hypnosis in David.

Instantly, David's demeanor changed. His body language shifted, becoming more submissive and attentive. He obediently awaited Stella's command, betraying no signs of his previous conversation with Nina.

Nina, puzzled by the sudden change, observed David and Stella, trying to figure out what was going on.

Stella, reveling in David's obedience, leaned in and whispered, "You're going to clean the counter, and then you're going to give Nina the best, most detailed service you can. And you won't remember being hypnotized. Do you understand?"

David's response was subdued but completely compliant. "Yes, Stella."

With that, he proceeded to clean the counter and then walked over to Nina to attentively take her order and provide her with exceptional service. All the while, Stella watched with a wicked smile, her arousal growing as her power over David's mind became more evident.

Nina couldn't shake the feeling that something was off, but she couldn't put her finger on it. She would definitely want to catch up with David later, away from the cafe and whatever strange influence Stella seemed to have over him.

conversation.content:
(Catherine sometimes hypnotizes her flatmate Darren. Darren loves going under now, so normal beforehand and so dazed and docile in trance, and Catherine affectionately humiliates him in front of others)

Darren’s sitting watching tv when Catherine and Emma get in late from a night at the pub, laughing and talking loudly. They kick off their shoes and sit down on the sofa with their sweaty bare feet up on the coffee table.

“Hey Darren,” Catherine says, looking over at him. “Feeling a bit tired, are you?”

“Um, yeah…” Darren replies, starting to feel a bit drowsy.

“Well, why don’t you go ahead and get ready for bed?” Catherine suggests, her voice soothing.

Darren stands up and obediently heads towards his bedroom, barely realizing what he’s doing. As he changes into his pyjamas, he feels increasingly relaxed and passive.

When he emerges from his room, Catherine is waiting for him with a sly grin on her face. “Now, Darren,” she says in an exaggeratedly patronizing tone. “You’re going to be a good little boy for us, aren’t you?”

Darren nods dumbly, barely able to think for himself anymore.

Catherine and Emma giggle as they make Darren fetch them drinks and snacks, treating him like a servant. He doesn’t seem to mind, though – he’s too deep under Catherine’s spell to protest.

Eventually, Catherine snaps her fingers and Darren blinks awake, looking around in confusion. “What…what happened?” he asks, feeling disoriented.

“Oh, nothing,” Catherine shrugs. “Just having a bit of fun with our little hypnotized puppy.”

Darren blushes, feeling embarrassed at being so easily controlled. But he can’t deny that it’s also kind of exciting to be under Catherine’s power like this. He wonders what other commands she’ll make him follow in the future…
Catherine and Darren go to the cinema...

Catherine and Darren were excited to see the new thriller movie that had just come out. As they sat in the dark cinema, Catherine looked over at Darren with a mischievous glint in her eye.

“Darren,” she whispered, leaning over towards him. “Wouldn’t it be fun for you to act out the movie?”

Darren felt a surge of excitement and nervousness flood through him at the suggestion. He'd never done anything like that before, but the idea of being under Catherine's control again was irresistible.

“Um, sure,” he replied, his voice barely above a whisper.

Catherine smiled and placed her hand on Darren's knee, her touch sending shivers down his spine. “Relax and just let my words wash over you,” she murmured.

As the movie started to play, Catherine whispered suggestively in Darren's ear, making him act out the scenes from the movie. He would flinch every time there was a jump scare, gasp whenever there was a plot twist, and he even tried to imitate some of the fight scenes.

Catherine affectionately mocked him as he performed, softly teasing him about how he was just like a puppet on a string. Despite feeling embarrassed, Darren couldn't help but feel intoxicated by Catherine's hypnosis and the rush of being under her control.

Soon the movie ended, and the lights came on, dispelling the spell that Catherine had cast over him.

“You were such a good little actor, Darren,” Catherine chuckled, patting his cheek. “Let's do this again sometime.”

Darren was left feeling a little ashamed but couldn't deny how eager he felt towards experiencing Catherine's hypnotic powers once again.

conversation.content:
(Kirsty W (66, tv presenter), as an older woman, uses some kind of hypno-item to entrance a younger man and get him to worship her feet, etc.)

It was the end of a long day’s shooting for the new documentary on women’s rights and Kirsty was just about ready for a gin and tonic. They headed back to the hotel in a Volvo, the drizzle falling steadily around them. What a day!

She thought to herself, but her mind kept wandering to the young production assistant, Jake, who had caught her eye earlier on. He was a ruggedly handsome lad of twenty-five, with a chiseled jawline and intense blue eyes.

She knew it was inappropriate to feel this way, but Kirsty couldn't help herself. She was a woman in her mid-sixties, but there was something about Jake that made her heart race and her blood boil. Kirsty decided she needed to take control of the situation. She reached into her purse where she kept her hypno-item, a small silver pendant that she'd had for years, and locked eyes with Jake.

As she did so, she began to move the pendant in a slow, rhythmic motion, back and forth, back and forth. The soft clink of the pendant on the edge of the bag was enough to draw Jake's attention away from the window and towards Kirsty.

"Jake, come closer," Kirsty said softly, but in an irresistible tone of command. "Look at the pendant and listen to my voice."

Jake, entranced, moved closer, his eyes locked onto the glinting silver pendant that Kirsty held in her hand. His breathing was becoming deeper and more regular as Kirsty's soothing voice filled the car, coaxing him deeper and deeper into a state of trance.

"Jake, from now on, whenever you see my feet, you will feel an overwhelming desire to worship them," Kirsty said, her voice smooth as silk. "You will feel a sense of devotion and awe whenever you are in my presence, and you will never resist the urge to do whatever I ask of you."

Suddenly, Kirsty snapped her fingers and Jake came out of the trance, feeling shaky and confused.

"Is everything okay, Kirsty?" he asked, looking at her with a mixture of awe and confusion.

"Everything is fine, Jake," Kirsty replied, with a mysterious smile on her lips. "Just remember, whatever happens, you will always be devoted to me."
