She gets him to behave like a dazed servant, and do anything she says (with detailed description), leaving Victoria laughing & fascinated. “He went under so easily!!!” “Haha. He loves to obey. Well… he does now!”

Title: Hypnotized Love

INT. COFFEE SHOP - DAY

David, an indie boy in his 20s with shaggy hair, serves coffee to his friend Victoria at a small table in the coffee shop. Lindsay, a confident and assertive woman in her late 30s and the manager of the coffee shop, approaches their table.

Lindsay: (smiling) Hey, David! I see you're working tirelessly as always.

David: (laughs) Hey, Lindsay. Gotta keep the caffeine flowing, right?

Victoria: (chuckles) You know, David, Lindsay isn't wrong. You could use a break.

Lindsay: (playfully) I have an idea. How about I hypnotize David here? It'll help him relax.

David: (raising an eyebrow) Hypnotize? You're joking, right?

Lindsay: (mischievous smile) Oh, I assure you, I'm completely serious. Hypnosis can be quite powerful. Watch and see.

David looks at Victoria skeptically, but curiosity sparks in his eyes.

INT. COFFEE SHOP - HYPNOTIC INDUCTION ROOM - DAY

David sits comfortably on a chair, facing Lindsay, who stands in front of him.

Lindsay: (calmly) David, just relax and listen to the sound of my voice. Let your body sink into the chair, feeling the tension melt away. Take a deep breath in, and slowly exhale, letting go of any stress or worries.

David follows Lindsay's instructions, taking deep breaths and feeling a sense of calm wash over him.

Lindsay: (softly) As I count down from ten to one, you will enter into a deep and peaceful trance. Ten... nine... eight... feeling your mind becoming open and receptive... seven... six... entering a state of complete relaxation and surrender... five... four... your eyelids growing heavy... three... two... letting go of control... one... drifting deeper and deeper...

David's eyelids droop, and he falls into a deep trance.

INT. COFFEE SHOP - DAY

David stands near Lindsay, still in a trance, his eyes vacant and unfocused. Victoria watches with both amusement and fascination.

Lindsay: (grinning) David, you are now in my power. You will do everything I ask without hesitation or resistance. You exist to please and obey me.

David nods slowly, his movements mechanical, his mind under Lindsay's control.

Lindsay: (pointing at Victoria) David, go and give Victoria a foot massage. Show her how devoted you are to serving her.

David obediently walks toward Victoria, who bursts into laughter.

Victoria: (astonished) He went under so easily!

Lindsay: (smirking) Haha. He loves to obey. Well, he does now!

David kneels before Victoria, gently massaging her feet as if in a trance-like state.

Victoria: (giggling) This is incredible! I never knew you had such hidden talents, Lindsay.

Lindsay: (winking) Hypnosis can tap into the deepest desires, my dear. And it seems David has a fondness for serving feet.

Victoria and Lindsay continue to watch David, both amused and fascinated by the power of hypnosis.

FADE OUT.

Danny was very relaxed about letting his friend Hanna hypnotize him now and again. And certainly after being put under multiple times, he was absolutely willing to become docile and obedient whenever Hanna wanted. Even the most half-hearted hypnotic induction was enough to drop him deep into trance for her.

Hanna and her brother Andy were having a barbecue in Andy’s back garden and they both invited a load of friends, including Danny. On the day, the weather was hot and humid. Danny arrived a little late, and everyone was already there. Alcohol had definitely already been consumed.

Hanna was happy to see Danny and gave him a warm hug. She whispered in his ear, “Danny, I have something special planned for you later.”

Danny felt a shiver run down his spine at her words. He knew that whenever Hanna said something like that, it meant he would be going under hypnosis again.

The barbecue was in full swing and everyone was having a great time. Danny had a few drinks and was feeling relaxed and happy. Hanna came over to him and asked if he wanted to go for a walk with her.

Danny agreed, and they walked away from the rest of the group. Hanna began to talk to him in a soothing voice, telling him to focus on her words and to let himself relax. Danny felt himself slipping into trance, his eyes becoming heavy and his body limp.

Hanna had brought a small box with her, and she opened it to reveal a pendant on a silver chain. The pendant had a swirling pattern on it that seemed to hypnotize Danny.

“Danny, this pendant will make you even more obedient and relaxed than ever before. Whenever you wear it, you will feel a deep sense of calm and submission. You will do whatever I say without hesitation,” said Hanna.

Danny nodded, knowing that he was already too deep in trance to resist. Hanna put the pendant around his neck and he felt its weight against his chest.

“From now on, whenever you hear me snap my fingers, you will instantly fall into trance and become my obedient subject. Do you understand?” asked Hanna.

“Yes, Hanna,” replied Danny, his voice monotone and robotic.

“Good. And when I snap my fingers again, you will wake up feeling refreshed and ready to do my bidding,” said Hanna.

She snapped her fingers, and Danny blinked, coming out of trance. He felt a little disoriented but also exhilarated at the thought of being Hanna’s obedient slave.

“Let’s go back to the group now,” said Hanna, taking Danny’s arm and leading him back to the barbecue.

Danny’s mind was filled with thoughts of submission and obedience to Hanna. He knew that he would do anything she asked of him, and he couldn’t wait for her to snap her fingers again so that he could go back into trance and serve her once more.

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (mid-fifties, glasses) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jenny (overweight, sandals, red toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Jenny to see how easily her friend can be made to become their helplessly hypnotized slave for a little while, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

Jenny nods, taking a sip of her iced tea. 

“David’s been my friend since high school,” she says, glancing at David, who smiles back at her. 

Sandra's smile widens, and she turns her attention to David. “David, have I ever told you about the time you were hypnotized by me?” she asks casually. 

David furrows his brow. “Hypnotized? No, I don’t think so,” he says, taking a step back. 

Jenny looks confused as well, peering at Sandra over the rim of her glass. 

Sandra chuckles. “Oh, it’s no big deal. I just thought I’d show you both how easy it is to put David under my control,” she says with a wave of her hand. 

Before Jenny or David can react, Sandra begins swinging a gold pocket watch in front of David's eyes. His gaze is drawn to the shiny object, and soon his body relaxes, his breathing slowing down. 

Jenny watches in shock as David stands motionless, his eyes following the hypnotic watch. She tries to shake him awake, but he remains unresponsive, completely under Sandra's spell. 

Sandra has a mischievous glint in her eye as she starts issuing commands to David. 

“From now on, David, you will do everything I say. You won’t question my authority or try to resist. You will be my loyal slave, always eager to serve and obey me,” she whispers in a low, hypnotic voice. 

Jenny watches, horrified, as David nods obediently, his glazed over eyes locked on Sandra's. 

Sandra snaps her fingers, and David snaps out of his trance. He blinks, looking around in confusion. 

“Did I miss something?” he asks, scratching his head. 

Sandra and Jenny exchange a knowing look, but neither of them says anything. 

Jenny makes an excuse to leave, unable to shake the image of her friend being turned into a mindless drone. As she walks out, she vows never to return to Sandra's cafe again. 

David, meanwhile, goes back to working like nothing happened, completely oblivious to the strange power Sandra holds over him.

Sandra shrugs, not looking the least bit contrite. “Oh, lighten up, Jenny. It was just a bit of harmless fun.”

Jenny shakes her head, feeling sick to her stomach.

“That wasn’t funny,” she repeats quietly, casting one last look at David before turning and walking out of the cafe.

conversation.content:
(David’s colleague Clare embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him even more susceptible to hypnosis in the future, implanting a ‘deep sleep’ trigger, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending, to her astonishment and glee)

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare slipped her pretty feet out of her strappy sandals.

She was feeling relaxed and in a playful mood. They were all laughing and joking, reminiscing about past work trips and shared experiences. David was enjoying himself too. He had been working hard for the last few months and it was good to let his hair down. 

Clare leaned in and whispered to David, “You know I’ve always wanted to hypnotize someone.” She giggled and took another sip of her drink. David raised an eyebrow, “Do you even believe in hypnosis?” Clare shook her head, “Not really, but it’s worth a try.” She laughed again, feeling bold and adventurous. 

David didn’t take her seriously, but he was intrigued. “Okay, go ahead and try.” Clare looked around, making sure no one was paying attention to them, and took a deep breath. “Okay, David, just relax. Keep your focus on me.” She swayed her hand in front of his face, mimicking what she had seen on TV. 

To her surprise, David’s eyes followed her hand and his breathing slowed down. Clare was stunned. She had expected David to laugh it off or play along, not actually go under. She tried a few simple suggestions, making him cluck like a chicken and act like a robot. The rest of the team were laughing and cheering them on. 

But Clare saw an opportunity. She whispered into David’s ear, “From now on, whenever you hear me say the word ‘deep sleep’, you will immediately feel drowsy and fall into a deep trance. You will be even more susceptible to hypnosis from now on.” David had no memory of this, but Clare knew she had implanted a powerful suggestion. 

They all left the pub together, still buzzing from the fun they had had. David was feeling a bit woozy, but he attributed it to the alcohol. Clare was looking forward to testing out her new ‘deep sleep’ trigger on David in the future. She loved the feeling of power it gave her, and she couldn’t wait to see just how far she could take it.
rewrite this, but set it in 13th century Genoa, with appropriate changes

Most of the merchants from the Genoese trading guild were celebrating the successful end of a long voyage. They had been at a tavern for a few hours already, with goblets of wine on the table and a boisterous atmosphere surrounding them. Clare removed her shoes, feeling the cool floor under her feet. She was in a playful mood tonight and her companions were already a little tipsy. 

Leaning towards David, she whispered, "I've always been curious about this art of hypnosis. Do you believe in its power?" David raised his bushy eyebrow and chuckled, "I'd be surprised if such a thing really exists." The Genoese merchants were known for their hearty skepticism. 

"Let me try anyway," Clare insisted, swishing a hand in front of David's face as she had seen travelling merchants do in Persia. To her astonishment, David's eyes followed her hand and he fell into a deep trance. 

The other merchants were amazed and Clare found a newfound power in her ability to influence others. She whispered to David, "From now on, when you hear me say 'sleep deeply,' you will become instantly drowsy and fall into a trance, becoming more susceptible to hypnosis henceforth". David had no memory of this and Clare knew she had implanted a powerful suggestion that could be used for many years to come.

As they left the tavern laughing and joking, David swayed a little, his words slurring. Clare suspected the wine had weakened any defenses he may have had. She looked forward to testing her new "sleep deeply" trigger on David in the future, and perhaps on some of the other skeptical merchants too. It was a source of pride for the curious and adventurous Clare, who had uncovered a hidden power within herself.

conversation.content:
(David’s colleague Clare embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him really love being hypnotized, and become even easier to hypnotize in future, which his workmates certainly take note of for the future, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending to do it, to her astonishment and glee)

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare had slipped her shoes off her pretty feet.

David couldn't help but stare. She caught him looking and chuckled. 

"What's on your mind, David? You look like you're in a trance," she teased. 

David laughed, "I don't think I believe in hypnosis." 

Clare raised an eyebrow, "Really? You don't think I could hypnotize you, David?" 

David shook his head, "No way." 

Clare giggled, "Well, let's test that theory then." 

She looked deep into his eyes and started to speak in a slow and soothing tone. David couldn't help but stare back into her eyes. 

Soon, everything else around him started to fade away, leaving just Clare's voice. David felt relaxed and at ease. He didn't even realize when he slipped into a trance-like state. 

Clare noticed that David was no longer responding to her questions. She grinned to herself and decided to use this opportunity to suggest some things to him. She began to whisper in his ear. "You love being hypnotized, David. It feels amazing and you want to go under every time I talk to you." 

She continued to whisper suggestions into his ear until he was completely under her spell. David's eyes fluttered closed and he slumped back in his chair. 

The rest of the team looked on in amazement at what had just happened. They had heard of hypnosis before, but they never thought they would see it in action. 

Clare decided to have some fun with the situation. She suggested to David that every time he heard a particular word, he would instantly go into a trance-like state and become very submissive and suggestible. 

David's eyes snapped open when Clare clicked her fingers. He looked around, feeling slightly disorientated. He couldn't remember anything that had just happened. All he knew was that he felt really good. 

The night continued on and the rest of the team made sure to keep David away from Clare, knowing the power she had over him. They chuckled to themselves every time they heard the word that would send David under. They couldn't wait to see what other suggestions Clare had planted in his mind.

conversation.content:
(David’s sister Kelly (20) embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him desperately love to obey her every command, even though it’s so humiliating to be in that position, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending to do an exaggerated fake induction, to her astonishment and glee) 

David rings his parents' doorbell, having come over for a surprise visit, but it's his younger sister Kelly who opens the door in her pyjamas and bare feet. "They're not in," she says. "But come in anyway."

David nods and steps inside, but as soon as he takes a few steps, he starts feeling lightheaded. He blinks rapidly, trying to regain his bearings, but it's too late.

Kelly jumps in front of him, claps her hands, and says, "Sleep!" David's heavy eyelids close, and he slumps forward.

Kelly can't believe it. For years, she's been joking around with David about hypnosis, but they never thought it was real. Yet here's David, completely under her control.

She grins devilishly and puts her hands on her hips. "David, can you hear me?" she asks. There's no response. She giggles to herself.

"I'm going to give you a little suggestion, and you're going to love following it. You're going to do everything I say, and it's going to make you feel so happy and obedient."

She pauses, wondering if she should go through with this - but the thought of having her big brother under her thumb is too irresistible. She leans in and whispers in his ear.

"David," she says, "when I snap my fingers, you're going to wake up feeling an intense desire to follow my every command. You'll do anything I say, no matter how ridiculous or humiliating it is, because obeying me is going to make you feel so good."

She snaps her fingers.

David blinks as though coming out of a deep sleep. He looks a little disoriented, but Kelly can see that her suggestion has worked. He looks up at her with a strange sort of adoration, his eyes following her every movement.

"Kelly," he says, his voice a little breathless. "What happened? What did you do to me?"

She grins, feeling like an evil genius. "Oh, nothing," she says innocently. "I was just goofing around, and you fell under my spell. But don't worry, David. From now on, you're going to be my loyal little servant. You'll do anything I tell you to do."

Despite the humiliation of being so obedient to his younger sister, David finds himself completely unable to resist her commands. He follows her around like a lost puppy, doing anything she asks him to do, wearing any costume she picks out for him, and even delivering her breakfast in bed every morning.

It's a strange and embarrassing situation, but David can't help himself. He's completely under his sister's control, and nothing can break the spell she's put him under.

conversation.content:
(in which Velma will hypnotize Fred, giving him suggestions to want to be the group’s submissive servant)

The Mystery Machine gang drove down to a little spot on the coast that they knew was usually quiet. The wind was high, but the rocks formed a natural barrier, and the view was beautiful from here. They got out of the van and set up their cooking gear, and deckchairs. Daphne and Velma took off their shoes and socks. Shaggy lit a doobie and they opened some beers.

Fred was eager to start exploring the area and finding clues for their next mystery, but Velma had other plans. She had been practicing hypnosis and wanted to try it out on him.

"Hey Fred, do you want to try something new?" Velma asked, giving him a sly smile.

"Sure, Velma! What is it?" Fred responded, eager to please his friend.

"I've been studying hypnosis and I want to try it on you. I promise it's safe and won't harm you in any way. Just trust me," Velma explained.

Fred was a bit apprehensive but nodded his head, trusting Velma's judgement.

"Okay, Fred, just focus on my voice and follow my instructions," Velma said soothingly, while swinging a small pendulum back and forth in front of his eyes.

As Fred's eyes followed the pendulum, Velma began whispering suggestions in his ear. She told him that he loved being submissive to the rest of the group and that he was happiest when he could serve them in any way possible. She told him that he wanted to be their loyal servant and would do anything they asked of him.

Fred's mind was foggy and he felt a sense of euphoria as Velma continued her hypnotic suggestions. He was only vaguely aware of the others in the group, who were enjoying their own activities.

Suddenly, Velma snapped her fingers and Fred was awakened from his trance. He looked around, confused, and saw the rest of the group finishing their beers and talking excitedly about the new mystery they were going to solve.

As the gang gathered their things and prepared to leave, Fred felt an overwhelming desire to obey their every command. He couldn't wait to serve them and make them happy.

Velma observed her handiwork with satisfaction. She knew that Fred would make the perfect submissive servant for the group and was secretly pleased with herself for finally getting what she desired from him.
re-write this, changing it from being about Scooby Doo characters to a bunch of 18 and 19 year olds who work at a fast food restaurant, changing anything necessary

A group of 18 and 19 year-olds worked together at a fast food restaurant. They were a bunch of close-knit friends who had known each other from high school. "Hey Mark, want to try something new?" Emma asked, giving him a sly smile.

"Uh, sure Emma, what is it?" Mark responded, apprehensive but trusting his friend.

"I've been practicing hypnosis and want to try it on you. It's completely safe and won't hurt you in any way. Just trust me," Emma explained.

Mark nodded his head and focused on Emma's voice as she swung a small pendulum in front of his eyes. She began whispering suggestions to him, making him believe that he loved being submissive to his friends and co-workers and that he was happiest when he could serve them in any way possible. She told him that he wanted to be their loyal servant and would do anything they asked of him.

Mark's mind was foggy as Emma continued her hypnotic suggestions. He vaguely realized his friends were still working around him.

When Emma snapped her fingers, Mark was awakened from his trance. He looked around confused but saw his friends continuing to work hard. Something felt different inside of him, like he had a newly acquired sense of purpose and eagerness to please his friends.

As the end of their shift approached, Mark felt an overwhelming desire to obey their every command. He couldn't wait to serve them and make them happy.

Emma smiled at her handiwork. She knew Mark would be the perfect submissive friend who was eager to help them out in any way possible. She felt accomplished in achieving her goal and was excited about the possibilities of what else she could hypnotize her friends into doing.
write about emma wearing flip-flops, walking up to mark in the street

Emma was walking up to Mark in the street, wearing her favorite pair of flip-flops. Mark had always talked about how much he loved them on her, so she decided to wear them specifically to see him. She could feel the warm sun on her skin and the light breeze slipping through her toes.

As she got closer, Mark turned his head and noticed her feet. He smiled wide, "Hey, Emma! Those flip-flops look great on you."

"Thanks, Mark!" Emma said, her face blushing slightly. "How have you been?"

Mark's eyes stayed fixated on Emma's feet for a moment, and Emma giggled at the attention she was getting from him.

"I've been good," Mark replied, finally looking up to meet Emma's eyes. "What about you? How's life been treating you?"

"It's been good," Emma said, her shoe slapping against her heel as she walked. "I've been practicing hypnosis recently and it's been really interesting."

Mark was intrigued and asked her to explain more about it. As they walked, Emma noticed Mark's eyes had moved back down to her feet again, and she decided to have a little fun.

"You know, Mark, I've heard that looking at someone's feet can be really relaxing and calming," Emma said, still walking in her flip-flops. "Why don't you take a closer look at mine?"

Mark looked a bit confused but followed Emma's lead, bending down to get a closer look at her feet. Emma felt a sense of empowerment knowing he was under her spell and enjoyed the feeling of being in control.

As they continued their conversation, Emma could feel Mark's eyes flickering back to her feet every now and then. She couldn't wait to see what else she could get him to do under her hypnosis.

As they parted ways, Emma stayed behind for a moment, feeling the pavement beneath her feet and happily knowing that she had just gained a new level of control over her friend.

Dave sat on the office floor, his eyes glazed over as he mindlessly massaged Big Lesley's sweaty bare feet. Lesley, a look of smug satisfaction on her face, leaned back in her chair comfortably while explaining the situation to her amazed colleague, Lisa.

Lesley: (smirking) Oh, Lisa, you won't believe what happened! I stumbled upon this incredible hypnotic technique that turns Dave into my obedient servant. Look at him, massaging my feet as if it's the most natural thing in the world.

Lisa: (wide-eyed) Are you serious? How did you manage to hypnotize him like that?

Lesley: (chuckling) It's actually quite simple. I read about this method online. All I had to do was use some specific words and phrases and repeat them to him while he was in a relaxed state. It took a few sessions, but now he's completely under my control.

Lisa: (astonished) That's absolutely insane! I can't believe Dave would willingly do that. Is he aware of what he's doing?

Lesley: Oh, not at all. Once he's in this hypnotic daze, he carries out any command I give him without question. It's quite convenient, to be honest. I can now focus on more important tasks while he attends to my needs.

Lisa: (curiously) But how did you come up with the idea of having him massage your feet specifically?

Lesley: (smirking) Well, I thought, why not make the most of it? Since he's under my control, I might as well enjoy a little pampering. So I suggested he massage my feet, and voila, here we are.

Lisa: (impressed) That's a devious but clever way to take advantage of the situation, Lesley. But aren't you worried someone might find out?

Lesley: (confidently) Not at all. Dave has no recollection of what happens when he's in this state. Plus, nobody really pays attention to what's happening under their noses in the office. It's our little secret.

Lisa: (nodding) I see. Well, I guess it's his own fault for falling into your trap.

Lesley: (smiling) That's one way to look at it. Now, should I have him fetch us some coffee before the hypnosis wears off?

One warm, humid afternoon in July, when all the women were wearing sandals in the office, Justine called Dan into her office. Dan hesitated, feeling uneasy with the fact that Jacqui was in the room. "Yes, Justine, what's going on?"

Justine leaned back in her chair, her eyes locked on Dan's. "Well, it has come to my attention that you've been feeling a bit... left out in the department. Is that correct?"

Dan shifted uncomfortably in his seat. "I wouldn't say left out, but I feel like the atmosphere could be more inclusive."

"Oh, I see," Justine replied, her voice dripping with condescension. As Dan watched her speak, he could have sworn he saw a slight twinkle in her eye, but he shook the thought off as his imagination. "And do you think this is because I prefer working with the women in the department?"

"Well, that's certainly a factor, but overall I think there's just a general lack of team spirit and camaraderie," Dan said, trying to remain diplomatic.

Justine and Jacqui exchanged a brief glance, as if sharing some private joke. "Dan, I understand where you're coming from," Justine said, her voice softening dangerously. "And I'm going to help you feel more at peace with your place in our department. Just listen to my voice."

Dan's instincts screamed at him to get up and leave the room, but before he knew it, he was unable to tear his gaze away from Justine's intense stare. His body felt heavy, and his mind foggy. It was as if a thick, syrupy haze had descended over his brain, making it impossible to think clearly or even retain a thought for more than a few seconds.

"Justine, what's... what's happening?" Dan managed, his voice sounding weak and distant, as if it belonged to someone else.

She leaned in closer, her eyes never leaving his. "You're feeling sleepy, Dan. So very sleepy. And the more you fight it, the deeper into this trance you'll go. That's it, let go. Embrace it."

Dan wanted to argue, to fight back, but the weight of Justine's will crushed his resistance. As a new wave of drowsiness washed over him, Jacqui's mocking laughter in the background faded away, replaced by a blissful emptiness that robbed him of his strength, his will, and his identity.

In that moment, Dan knew only one thing – he was powerless to resist Justine, and he would do whatever she wanted. After all, her eyes were so captivating, and her voice so soothing. It was so much easier to just listen and obey.

And so, Dan's office life became something out of a nightmare – a mental prison where Justine held the keys. But with each day that passed, he found himself more and more willing to accept his new reality, to bow to the whims of the woman who controlled him so completely.

He wasn't even aware that he was doing it – but deep down, a part of him enjoyed the strange new dynamic, the release from responsibility, the exhilaration of complete submission.

And as the months wore on, the women in the office couldn't help but notice the change in Dan – the way he bent over backwards to accommodate their needs, the adoration in his eyes as he looked at Justine. They knew he was different now, and some part of them relished the thought that they, too, had a hand in his transformation. It was their little secret, the unspoken bond that united them all in ways they could never have imagined.
A typical summer day in the office, now.

On a typical summer day in the office, the sun streamed through the tall windows, casting a warm, golden glow throughout the room. The hum of the air conditioning system filled the air with a comforting white noise, combating the humid air outside. The faint scent of a floral air freshener drifted throughout the office, adding an extra touch of brightness to the atmosphere.

Dan arrived at work right on time, carrying a box of donuts for his co-workers with a bright, eager smile. Greeted by the familiar faces of his female colleagues, he set the box down on the break room table, proud to be of service in any way he could.

As everyone sat down at their desks, the office buzzed with activity. Phones rang with customer inquiries, keyboards clacked as reports were typed up, and printers whirred with the sound of emails being printed out for review. The vibe was productive yet relaxed, as everyone blended into the rhythm of the workday.

During lunch, Dan often found himself assisting his colleagues with various tasks – getting drinks for them from the vending machine, helping to set up an impromptu meeting space or topping up printer papers. He reveled in this newfound appreciation for the seemingly mundane aspects of office life, knowing deep down that his actions brought him closer to Justine.

Justine, of course, continued to hold sway over Dan with her uncanny ability to hypnotize him. The more Dan helped his colleagues, the more favorably they looked upon Justine's leadership. The days blended seamlessly into one another, leaving Dan in a state of content servitude.

Among these female colleagues, conversations were professional yet punctuated with light-hearted banter. Justine’s hypnotic power over Dan had become a common knowledge among all the women in the office, but it was discussed with a wink and a nod, another shared secret that fostered a sense of sisterhood among them.

As the day drew to a close, Dan found himself tidying up the office space, organizing supplies, and checking in with his colleagues one final time before everyone packed up to leave. There was a sense of satisfaction in the way he carried himself, knowing that he had been of use to the women in his department.

The sun dipped lower in the sky as Dan locked up the office for the night, stepping out into the warm evening air. He felt a sense of purpose and happiness as he made his way home, having a deep admiration for Justine and the unity of the office.

Though his life had changed beyond recognition since that fateful summer day in Justine's office, Dan found solace in the acceptance of his role in this new world – a place where his desires and ambitions were molded by the hypnotic gaze of a woman he could never defy.

conversation.content: Dave has been conditioned by his overweight colleague Pat over several hypnotic sessions (which he doesn’t consciously remember)(to get him to agree at first, she told him it was a meditation thing) to believe he is lowly & is only fit to be at her feet. In this script (kinky), Dave sits, blank & dazed, on the floor by Pat’s sweaty bare feet, while his work colleagues are drinking wine, drunk & laughing, congratulating big Pat.

Title: The Submissive Hypnosis

INT. OFFICE PARTY - NIGHT

A lively office party is taking place with work colleagues mingling, enjoying drinks, laughter, and celebrations. In one corner of the room, DAVE, a dazed expression on his face, sits cross-legged on the floor by PAT's feet. PAT, an overweight woman, has her feet rested on a cushion, bare and slightly sweaty.

SUPERVISOR (toasting with wine glass)
Here's to Pat, the star of the evening! Congratulations on your outstanding achievements!

The crowd responds with cheers and applause. Laughter fills the room.

DAVE, still under the hypnotic influence, remains motionless, his gaze fixated on Pat's feet.

CO-WORKER 1 (grinning)
You really nailed that presentation, Pat! We couldn't have done it without you.

PAT (smiling smugly)
Oh, please, I just did what anyone would do.

CO-WORKER 2 (chuckles)
No way! You're one in a million, Pat. We all owe you big time.

DAVE's mind seems absent, lost in a hypnotic trance, oblivious to the festivities around him.

CO-WORKER 3 (teasingly)
Hey, Dave, enjoying the view down there?

DAVE doesn't acknowledge the comment, remaining fixated on Pat's feet, his thoughts consumed by his hypnotic conditioning.

CO-WORKER 1 (playfully nudging Dave)
Come on, Dave, snap out of it! You're missing all the fun.

Dave blinks, a hint of confusion crossing his face as he slowly returns to the present moment.

DAVE (mumbling softly)
Huh? Sorry, I…

CO-WORKER 2 (interrupting)
Don't worry about it, Dave. We know you've been putting in a lot of hours working with Pat lately.

CO-WORKER 3 (grinning)
Yeah, we've heard how close you two have become.

PAT (giggling)
Oh, it's just a mentorship thing. Dave's been a great help.

Dave's expression shifts slightly, a mix of discomfort and submission.

SUPERVISOR (raising the wine glass)
Well, cheers to Dave too, for his hard work and dedication. Without his support, we wouldn't be celebrating this success.

The crowd raises their glasses, toasting Dave, albeit with a subtle hint of awkwardness, not entirely understanding the dynamic between Pat and Dave.

DAVE forces a smile, his gaze still drawn to Pat's feet, his mind conflicted by the conditioning that has altered his perception of himself.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: In this detailed script, whenever Nadine tells colleague Dave to do something, he obeys with alacrity, he’s always sneaking looks at her feet when she wears sandals. Nadine’s ‘wine oclock’ friend Jan (who Dave doesn’t get along with) teasingly comments on this, embarrassing Dave. The two of them pitilessly tease Dave, further mortifying him, & when Nadine firmly gives the order, he submissively complies and massages his enemy Jan’s feet. it’s obviously humiliating, & Nadine shares with an astonished Jan the secret of how she hypnotizes Dave.

Title: Hypnotizing Dave

INT. OFFICE - DAY

Nadine, a confident and assertive woman, is working diligently at her desk. Dave, her colleague, is sitting at his desk nearby. The office is bustling with activity.

NADINE
(looking up from her work)
Dave, could you please file these documents for me? I need them organized by department.

Dave immediately stands up, eager to please Nadine.

DAVE
(with enthusiasm)
Of course, Nadine! I'll take care of it right away.

As Dave bends down to pick up the documents from Nadine's desk, he steals a quick glance at her feet, which are adorned with sandals. However, his actions go unnoticed.

Enter JAN, a playful and mischievous colleague, holding a cup of coffee.

JAN
(teasingly)
Hey Dave, I see you couldn't resist taking a peek at Nadine's feet again. You really have a thing for her sandals, don't you?

Dave, taken aback and embarrassed, tries to brush it off, but his discomfort is evident.

DAVE
(defensive)
Oh, come on Jan! It's nothing like that. I just... um, noticed her new sandals is all.

Jan smirks knowingly, clearly enjoying Dave's discomfort.

JAN
(playfully)
Sure, Dave, we believe you.

Nadine, curious about the conversation, looks up from her work.

NADINE
(raising an eyebrow)
What's going on here, you two?

Jan leans closer to Nadine, speaking in a low voice.

JAN
(gleefully)
I was teasing Dave about his foot fetish for you, Nadine.

NADINE
(amused)
Oh, really? That's interesting.

Jan nudges Nadine playfully, goading her to take it a step further.

JAN
(teasingly)
Well, if he's so into feet, maybe you can make him do something embarrassing with them.

Nadine smirks mischievously, realizing the potential for amusing herself and embarrassing Dave.

NADINE
(confidently)
Watch this, Jan. Dave, I order you to give Jan a foot massage.

Both Jan and Dave are stunned by Nadine's request.

DAVE
(shocked)
What? Nadine, I can't do that!

Nadine, exerting her hypnotic power, repeats her command firmly.

NADINE
(assertively)
Dave, give Jan a foot massage. Now.

Dave's resistance melts away, replaced with a submissive expression. He walks over to Jan's desk and hesitantly begins massaging her feet, much to his own humiliation.

Jan and Nadine burst into laughter, thoroughly amused by Dave's predicament. Dave, although embarrassed, remains under Nadine's control.

NADINE
(to Jan)
You see, I've been practicing hypnosis techniques on Dave for a while now. It's quite remarkable how easy it is to influence him.

JAN
(astonished)
I can't believe it! Nadine, you're a mastermind.

The two women continue to share a laugh as Dave reluctantly massages Jan's feet.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: A boho coffee shop owned by a hippie called Pippa. Dan works there. A hot summer day. Dan’s trainee-lawyer cousin Jeannine (they don’t get on) comes in to the cafe. They talk. Pippa comes over to introduce herself and chat. Pippa gradually brings the conversation round to hypnosis. For Jeannine’s entertainment, she offers to hypnotize Dan (he’s very reluctant) there and then. He goes under embarrassingly easily. Encouraged by Jeannine, Pippa bossily commands Dan to (mindlessly) give his cousin a foot massage like he’s a slave. In a daze, he even gets right between the toes. It's humiliating and Jeannine is gleeful, laughing.

Title: Summer Heat and Unexpected Hypnosis

INT. BOHO COFFEE SHOP - DAY

The aroma of freshly brewed coffee fills the air as customers enjoy their beverages in the cozy, bohemian atmosphere. Behind the counter stands DAN (25), a laid-back, free-spirited barista wearing a tie-dye apron. He absentmindedly wipes the sweat from his brow, trying to beat the scorching summer heat.

Enter JEANNINE (28), Dan's impeccably dressed and ambitious cousin, wearing a sleek suit and holding a file as she steps into the cafe.

DAN
(stifling a groan)
Jeannine, what brings you to my humble abode?

JEANNINE
(smirking)
Oh, just thought I'd witness the hippie life you're so fond of. Plus, this heat is unbearable outside.

Dan rolls his eyes but can't help but smile at his cousin's persistence.

PIPPA (60s), a vibrant and eccentric hippie, approaches their table.

PIPPA
(with a warm smile)
Ah, welcome! You must be Jeannine. I'm Pippa, the proud owner of this charming coffee shop. What can I get you?

JEANNINE
(polite but distant)
Just a glass of water, please.

As Pippa serves Jeannine water, she maneuvers the conversation towards a topic that always piques her interest - hypnosis.

PIPPA
So, Jeannine, since you're a lawyer, have you ever looked into the power of the mind? Hypnosis can work wonders, you know.

JEANNINE
(amused)
Hypnosis, huh? Are you telling me you're a hypnotist now, Pippa?

PIPPA
(chuckles)
Well, let's just say I've dabbled in it. Dan here can testify.

DAN
(uncomfortable)
Pippa, you know I don't...

JEANNINE
(interjecting)
Oh, please! This sounds like fun. I would love to see Dan under your hypnosis, Pippa.

Pippa's eyes light up mischievously, sensing an opportunity to entertain Jeannine.

PIPPA
(pointing at Dan)
Alright, Dan. Are you ready to be the center of attention?

DAN
(uncertain)
I suppose...

Pippa takes Dan's hand and begins the hypnotic process. Dan's eyes glaze over, and he falls into a suggestible state.

JEANNINE
(excitedly)
Oh, this is too good. Pippa, make him do something embarrassing!

Pippa gives Jeannine a playful wink and smirks before turning her attention back to Dan.

PIPPA
(authoritative)
Dan, I want you to give your cousin Jeannine a foot massage. As though you were her... obedient slave.

Dan's face reddens, but he mindlessly obeys the command, sinking to his knees in front of Jeannine, who is now grinning uncontrollably.

JEANNINE
(laughing)
Oh my, this is priceless! Right between the toes, Dan. Don't miss a spot!

Dan, still in a daze, diligently massages Jeannine's feet, completely humiliated by the situation.

PIPPA
(laughing)
Alright, Dan. You can snap out of it now.

Dan shakes his head, his consciousness returning. He jumps up, embarrassed, while Jeannine bursts into a fit of laughter.

DAN
(grinning awkwardly)
You both took great pleasure in that, didn't you?

PIPPA
(teasingly)
Oh, it was all in good fun, my dear. Now, how about we get you a well-deserved break from foot massages?

Jeannine and Pippa share a laugh as Dan, still blushing, shakes his head in disbelief.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: Chloe sometimes hypnotizes her willing husband, Max. In this script, Chloe 'lends' Max to her older sister Jenny (big woman) to do her housework, and whatever else she wants him to do. It's a rainy summer day. Max dazedly rings Jenny's bell, and she comes to the door in sweatpants and bare feet.

INT. JENNY'S HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - DAY

Max stands outside the door, dazed and holding an umbrella. He shakily rings the doorbell, and after a moment, JENNY, Chloe's older sister, opens the door. Jenny is a big woman, wearing sweatpants and bare feet. She eyes Max curiously.

JENNY
(smiling mischievously)
Well, well. Look who Chloe has sent my way. Max, isn't it?

MAX
(stammering)
Uh, y-yes. Hi, Jenny.

Jenny steps aside, inviting Max inside.

JENNY
Come on in, Max. It's pouring out there.

Max enters cautiously, closing the umbrella, and looks around the room. He notices the cozy, lived-in atmosphere of Jenny's house.

MAX
(quietly)
Nice place you have here, Jenny.

JENNY
(grinning)
Thanks, but enough small talk. Chloe made it clear that you're here to help me out with some housework and whatever else I want you to do.

Max's eyes widen, realizing the possible tasks that lie ahead.

MAX
(nervously)
Uh... yes, whatever you need, Jenny.

Jenny walks towards the sofa, motioning for Max to follow.

JENNY
Let's start with some cleaning, shall we? The floors could use a good scrubbing.

Max nods obediently, slowly moving towards the broom and mop Jenny points out.

MAX
(whispering to himself)
I can't believe I'm doing this.

Max starts sweeping the floor while Jenny supervises, occasionally pointing out missed spots. The rain pours outside, creating a soothing background noise.

JENNY
(smirking)
You know, Max, I always thought you were too good for Chloe. Seems like you're quite the handyman.

MAX
(blushing)
I... uh... try my best.

Jenny continues watching Max, her gaze lingering a bit longer than necessary.

JENNY
(slyly)
You know, Max, while you're here under my command, we could try some other things too. Things Chloe would never let you explore.

Max's eyes widen, surprised by Jenny's proposition. He nervously glances around the room.

MAX
(whispering)
Are you sure about this, Jenny? Chloe hypnotizes me, but...

JENNY
(interupting, confidently)
Hypnosis, mind control, whatever it is, I've always been curious to see if it works on you. And I promise, Max, this will be our little secret.

Rain continues to pour outside as Max hesitates, torn between curiosity and loyalty.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content:
(David’s colleague Clare embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him really love being hypnotized by her, and become even easier to hypnotize in future, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending to do it, to her astonishment and glee)

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare had slipped off her shoes.

She was feeling good and enjoying the party atmosphere.

“So, David, have you ever been hypnotized before?” she asked him with a mischievous smile on her face.

David looked at her skeptically, “Come on, Clare, hypnosis isn’t real. It’s all just a big scam.”

Clare chuckled, “Well, some people believe it’s real. It’s just a matter of finding the right hypnotist.”

She noticed David’s eyes narrowing as he stared at her, “You’re not going to hypnotize me, are you?”

Clare shrugged innocently, “Not if you don’t want me to.”

She moved closer to him and started to speak in a low, soothing tone of voice. David’s eyes flickered as he felt himself becoming more and more relaxed. He started to feel a strange sensation in his head, like something was slipping away from him.

Clare watched in amazement as David went under her spell. She could see his body becoming limp and relaxed in his chair. She had never hypnotized anyone before, it was just a joke to her, but now she was giddy with excitement.

“David,” she whispered, “you’re feeling very relaxed and sleepy now. You’re going to fall even deeper under my spell. You’ll love being hypnotized by me.”

David nodded slowly in agreement. He was completely under her control.

Clare continued to feed him suggestions for what felt like hours. She made him love being hypnotized, and promised that every time she used her hypnotic powers on him in the future he would go even deeper under her spell, and be even more suggestible and open to her commands.

Finally, she snapped her fingers and David came back to the real world, feeling totally refreshed and happy, as if he had just had the best nap of his life.

“Wow, that was amazing,” he said with a big grin on his face, “I can’t believe I actually went under.”

Clare smiled slyly, “Well, it’s a good thing you enjoyed it, David. That means you’ll be even easier to hypnotize next time.”

But despite her promises, David had no memory of what she’d done to him. He just knew that he was looking forward to the next time they had a joke about hypnosis.
write a script for a time at work the following week when Clare re-hypnotizes him with Donna and Vicky watching.

FADE IN:

INT. OFFICE - DAY

David is sitting at his desk typing away on his computer, when Clare walks in with her two friends, Donna and Vicky.

CLARE: (excitedly) Hey David! Do you remember last weekend when I hypnotized you?

DAVID: (smiling) Yeah, it was funny. But you know it's not real, right?

CLARE: (smiling slyly) Oh, I assure you it's real. In fact, I think it's time we gave it another try.

David looks at her skeptically, but he can already feel his body starting to relax as Clare talks to him in her soothing tone.

DONNA: (watching with interest) Wow, I've never seen anyone go under like that before.

VICKY: (amazed) It's like he's in a trance or something.

CLARE: (to David) You're feeling so relaxed right now. Your mind is open and ready to accept any suggestion I give you.

David nods slowly, becoming more and more suggestible with each passing second.

CLARE: (whispering) And now, David, every time I snap my fingers, you'll become even more deeply hypnotized.

She snaps her fingers, and David's head drops down as he falls into a deeper trance.

DONNA: (astonished) Holy cow, I think he's even more hypnotized than before!

VICKY: (curious) What kind of suggestions are you giving him?

CLARE: (grinning mischievously) Just a few suggestions to make him more susceptible to hypnosis in the future. And maybe a suggestion or two to make him do some silly little things.

DONNA: (laughing) Oh, I can't wait to see what he'll do!

CLARE: (to David) David, when I snap my fingers, you'll wake up feeling refreshed and happy. And you'll be in the mood to do anything Donna and Vicky ask you to do.

She snaps her fingers, and David's head pops back up. He blinks a few times, feeling totally refreshed and energized.

DAVID: (smiling) Wow, that was amazing. I feel so good!

DONNA: (grinning) Hey David, why don't you go make us some coffee?

VICKY: (giggling) Yeah, and make sure you dance while you do it!

David nods obediently, getting up from his chair and starting to dance his way to the coffee machine.

CLARE: (smiling triumphantly) Looks like my hypnosis skills are getting better and better.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content: Script: David (20, uni student) and his younger sister Ruth (16), who’s skilled in hypnosis, are watching TV with Ruth's friend Aimee (16) on a summer afternoon. Ruth and Aimee are barefoot on the sofa. Through a covert hypnosis script, Ruth hypnotizes David into a trance using casual conversation and fractionation techniques, ultimately suggesting he becomes their footstool, with no awakening scene.

INT. LIVING ROOM - DAY

The sun streams through the windows of a cozy, disheveled living room. We see DAVID, a lanky, unshaven 20-year-old in a university hoodie, his gaze fixed on the TV playing a casual action movie. His sister RUTH, a confident 16-year-old with an impish smile, sits on the sofa with her friend AIMEE, also 16. Both girls are barefoot, their feet casually propped up on the edge.

David flips through the channels, uninterested, stopping occasionally at scenes of explosions and chase sequences.

RUTH
David, check this scene out, it's super intense.

David looks over, mildly intrigued, then turns back to the TV.

RUTH (CONT'D)
Hey, you okay? You seem kind of out of it today.

DAVID
(Yawning)
Just didn’t sleep great last night, that’s all.

RUTH
(With a sly smirk)
I could help with that, you know. I've been practicing something really cool.

DAVID
(Skeptical)
What, more of your hypnosis stuff?

RUTH leans forward, her voice casual yet compelling.

RUTH
Don't knock it till you try it. Nothing like a quick power nap to reboot your system.

David chuckles, shaking his head as he turns his attention back to the TV.

DAVID
(Mildly amused)
Alright, Ruth the Mesmerizer, do your worst.

RUTH smiles, exchanging a knowing glance with AIMEE.

RUTH
Just listen to my voice, okay? It's like when you're zoning out on the TV. Notice how with each channel change, your eyes catch up a tad slower each time?

David nods, idly flipping channels.

RUTH (CONT'D)
(Enthusiastic)
See? Your mind is riding the waves of voices and sounds...

AIMEE joins in the conversation, her tone rhythmic and soothing.

AIMEE
Yeah, like a boat gently rocking on the ocean. Quite peaceful, if you let it happen...

David's flipping slows, his actions becoming more languid.

RUTH
Exactly, and every time you hear the click of the channels changing, it's like a tiny signal to relax a little more...

David’s hand pauses; he's mesmerized by the sound.

RUTH (CONT'D)
(Encouragingly)
Feeling it? It's cool how your own body knows when to give you a break. Notice how your shoulders might want to drop a bit with the next click...

The CLICK of the remote is audible as David's shoulders indeed relax further. A small SMILE plays on Ruth's face.

DAVID
(Murmuring)
Huh… yeah.

RUTH
(Casually)
Good, good. Now, like a little game, imagine with each number I say, you’ll let yourself drift deeper...

AIMEE
And come back just as easily when she reverses it.

RUTH begins counting downward from five to one, her voice steady and calm.

RUTH
Five... drifting away... four... lighter with each word... three... so easy, isn't it? Two... almost there... one.

David slumps further into the couch, head nodding forward slightly.

RUTH (CONT'D)
(Warmly)
And when I count back up, it'll feel like waking from a comforting nap. Five... slowly rising... four, see? But who says you have to wake up all the way? Three... two... nice and easy... one.

By the end of the session, Dan felt like a weight had been lifted from his shoulders. He knew that he still had work to do, but he was confident that he could overcome any challenges that came his way.

And Justine realized that, while hypnotic suggestions could be a powerful tool, they needed to be used with caution and sensitivity to avoid causing harm.

conversation.content:
Stella is a hippie in her late sixties now. At her cafe “Stella’s” there’s a real backpacking bohemian vibe. Stella mainly employs young trendy people. Stella’s into stuff like beads, tie-dye, meditation and particularly hypnosis. She even hypnotizes the staff sometimes.

It’s a hot summer day, sandals weather. Indie kid Dan has not long started work at Stella’s and his older sister Ruth has unexpectedly popped in to see how he’s getting on and have a coffee. When Stella sees that they know each other, she comes over to the counter to introduce herself.

[spoiler: Dan will end up mindlessly massaging Ruth’s feet, because Stella will easily drop him into trance with a snap, to Ruth’s great amusement, & yes, it’s humiliating (of course it must be - he's submissively massaging his big sister’s bare feet - ick!)]

Stella: (smiling) Hello there! I see you two know each other. I'm Stella, the proud owner of this cozy little cafe. How are you both doing today?

Dan: Hey Stella! This is my sister, Ruth. She just came to check out the place and have a coffee.

Ruth: Nice to meet you, Stella. This place has such a unique vibe. I love it!

Stella: Thank you, Ruth. We aim to create a peaceful and laid-back atmosphere here. By the way, I couldn't help but notice those gorgeous sandals. It's perfect weather for them, isn't it?

Ruth: (laughs) Thank you! Yes, it definitely is. I love the summer season.

Stella: You know, I'm quite into meditation and hypnosis. It's a fantastic way to relax and let go of any stress. I've even hypnotized some of my staff here before. It's quite amusing, really.

Dan: (curiously) Oh, really? That sounds interesting, Stella.

Stella: Indeed it is, Dan. In fact, I'm quite skilled in it. Would you be interested in experiencing a brief hypnosis session?

Dan: Uh, I'm not really sure...

Ruth: Come on, Dan! It could be fun! Give it a try.

Dan: Alright, if you say so.

Stella: Wonderful! Just relax and focus on my voice. With a snap of my fingers, you'll enter a deep state of relaxation.

(Stella snaps her fingers, and Dan's eyes start to glaze over)

Ruth: (amused) Oh, this should be good.

Stella: Dan, when you awaken, you won't be able to resist massaging Ruth's feet. It will bring you great joy to do so.

(Dan's eyes regain focus as he wakes up from his trance)

Dan: Whoa, that was intense. So, how did it go?

Ruth: (giggling) Oh, it went just fine, Dan. Just fine.

(Dan notices Ruth's bare feet and hesitantly starts massaging them)

Dan: (blushing) Um, Stella, how long will this last?

Stella: Oh, don't worry, Dan. It will wear off eventually. Enjoy your little foot massage, Ruth. It's quite relaxing, isn't it?

Ruth: (grinning) Oh, absolutely. You should offer this as a service, Stella!

Stella: (laughs) Perhaps I should, Ruth. But for now, let's all enjoy the moment and the unique experiences that life brings us.

(They all share a laugh and enjoy the rest of their time at Stella's cafe.)

conversation.content:
David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (mid-fifties, glasses) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Holly (ginger hair, sandals, black-painted toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Holly to see how easily her friend can be made to become their hypnotized slave for a little while, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

Holly nods and greets Sandra before turning to David. "How's it going, man? Still working here?"

David nods, smiling back at her. "Yeah, it's not a bad gig. Pays the bills, you know?"

Sandra leans in closer, her glasses glinting in the sunlight. "David, have I ever told you that you have the most mesmerizing eyes?"

David blinks, his gaze locking onto hers. "No, I don't think so. Why do you say that?"

Sandra just smiles and continues to speak in a calm, soothing voice. "Just relax, David. Let yourself go and listen to my voice. Don't worry about anything else. Just focus on me."

Holly watches with growing fascination as David's expression goes slack and he seems to zone out completely. She can't believe what she's seeing - it's like he's under some sort of spell.

Sandra turns to her with a mischievous glint in her eye. "Do you want to see something really fun?"

Holly can't resist. "Sure, what do you have in mind?"

Sandra gestures towards David, who's still standing there completely unaware of anything going on around him. "Watch this."

In a flash, Sandra snaps her fingers and utters a command. "David, do a little dance for us."

David blinks and then starts swaying his hips back and forth, his hands moving in time with the imaginary music. Holly bursts out laughing, trying to hold back the hysterics as David keeps dancing without a care in the world.

For the next ten minutes, Sandra has her fun, giving David silly commands and watching him obey each one without question. Holly can't believe what she's seeing - she's never seen anyone under hypnosis before.

Finally, Sandra snaps her fingers again and David blinks, coming back to reality. He looks around in confusion, then realizes that he's been dancing like a fool in front of Holly and his boss.

"What's going on?" he asks, looking embarrassed.

Sandra just smiles. "Nothing, David. You were just having a little fun." She winks at Holly and gives her a knowing grin.

Holly can't help but shake her head in amazement. She'll never forget this day for as long as she lives.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jenny (overweight, sandals, red toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Jenny to see how easily her friend can be made to become their utterly hypnotized servant for a little while, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

David nods, smiling at Jenny. "Yeah, we've been friends for ages. How are you, Jenny?"

Jenny returns his smile, taking a sip of her cold lemonade. "I'm good, thanks. How about you?"

"I'm doing great," David replies, feeling a little more relaxed now that someone he knows is around. "Just a little busy with work, as always."

Sandra nods knowingly. "Yes, David is such a hard worker. He's been doing a great job here at the cafe."

Jenny looks impressed. "Really? That's awesome, David. You must be great at this job."

David shrugs, feeling a little embarrassed. "I try my best. But Sandra is a great boss, too. She's been teaching me a lot."

Sandra smiles again, but this time her eyes seem to glint with something else. "Oh, David. You're too humble. I'm sure you could do so much more if you wanted to. In fact, I bet you could even be our little servant right now, couldn't you?"

David blinks in confusion, his mind suddenly feeling foggy. He can't quite understand what Sandra is saying, but his body seems to be responding automatically. He stands up from his chair, bowing his head. "Yes, of course. I'll do whatever you want."

Jenny looks shocked, staring at David in disbelief. "What... what just happened? David, are you okay?"

David doesn't respond, simply waiting for Sandra's next command. Sandra grins, feeling pleased with herself. "Oh, he's fine. He's just a little... hypnotized right now. Don't worry, it happens all the time."

Jenny looks even more worried now, standing up from her chair. "That's not normal, Sandra. You can't just hypnotize someone without their consent."

Sandra shrugs, her smile fading slightly. "I'm not hurting him. He's just doing what I say. And he won't remember any of this afterwards, either. It's just a little fun."

Jenny crosses her arms, looking angry. "It's not fun if he doesn't even know he's doing it. You need to stop, Sandra. It's not right."

Sandra rolls her eyes, looking annoyed. "Fine, fine. I won't do it anymore. But don't ruin our fun, Jenny. You always take things too seriously."

Jenny doesn't respond, simply picking up her bag and leaving the cafe. David remains standing there, waiting for Sandra's next command. But for the first time, he feels a sense of unease creeping in. He doesn't know why, but he feels like something isn't right. And he wishes he could remember what just happened.

Most of the team from the office were on the night out to celebrate David’s 30th birthday. They had been at the pub for an hour already and people were starting to get tipsy. Clare kicked her uncomfortable shoes off.

She had been waiting for the right moment to hypnotize David, and she knew this was it.

“David, let’s play a game,” Clare said slyly, locking her deep brown eyes onto his. “I’m going to ask you some questions, and I want you to answer honestly. Got it?”

David nodded, his interest piqued by the game-like nature of the conversation.

“First question: Have you ever been hypnotized before?” Clare asked with a mischievous glint in her eye.

David hesitated. He vaguely remembered her messing around with some hypnosis stuff in the office before, but it was fuzzy. “I don’t think so?”

Clare leaned in closer. “Are you sure?”

David blinked, and suddenly he was back in the office, with Clare standing in front of him, her voice low and soothing. “You love being hypnotized, David. It’s easy to slip under my trance. Whenever I say ‘sleep’, you will instantly close your eyes and become extremely receptive to my suggestions.”

A warm feeling of relaxation flooded over David, and he couldn’t help but grin stupidly. “Yes...I love being hypnotized,” he murmured.

“Good boy,” Clare said approvingly. “From now on, whenever I say ‘sleep’, you will go into a deep trance and become even more suggestible. After tonight, you’ll be my perfect little hypnotism subject.”

David’s eyes flickered closed as she said the trigger word, and he felt himself sinking into a blissful, trance-like state. He barely even noticed when the rest of his team came over to wish him a happy birthday.

All he could think about was Clare’s hypnotic voice, and the delicious thrill of being under her control.
Some of his colleagues did wonder why he was sitting on the floor giving Clare a foot rub.

David's colleagues were getting more and more curious about his behavior as the night went on. They watched as he sat on the floor at Clare's feet, massaging them with a dreamy expression on his face.

One of them leaned over to whisper to another. "What's up with David? He's acting like he's in a trance or something."

Another colleague chimed in. "Maybe he's just really drunk."

But as the night went on, David's behavior only became more and more bizarre. He found himself drawn to Clare's side whenever she spoke, hanging on her every word. And every time she said the trigger word, he would go even deeper under her spell.

Eventually, one of his coworkers, feeling concerned, approached him. "David, are you okay? You've been acting really weird all night."

David looked up at her, his eyes glassy and unfocused. "I'm fine," he said softly. "Just...relaxing."

His coworker frowned. "Are you sure? Maybe you should go home."

But David shook his head, his gaze drifting back to Clare. He couldn't leave her side. He needed to be near her, to hear her voice, to feel her control over him.

In the end, it was Clare who finally decided it was time for them to go home. She stood up, smoothing her dress, and David followed her like a lost puppy.

As they made their way out of the pub, his coworkers watched them go with a mixture of concern and unease. Something wasn't right about the way David was acting, and they all felt it. But they couldn't quite put their finger on what it was.

David rings his parents’ doorbell, having come over for a surprise visit, but it’s his younger sister Kelly who opens the door in her pyjamas and bare feet. “They’re not in,” she says. “But come in anyway.” She walks back to the living room, leaving the front door open.

David follows her, closing the door behind him. He notices that the room is empty apart from Kelly, who is lying on the sofa, idly playing on her phone.

“So where are Mum and Dad?” he asks, sitting down in the armchair opposite her.

“They’ve gone out,” Kelly replies, still not really looking at him.

“Oh,” says David. “Well, I guess I’ll just catch up with them later.”

“Sure,” says Kelly. “Or you could stay here and hang out with me.” She grins at him mischievously. “Maybe we could try some hypnosis.”

David raises an eyebrow. “Hypnosis?”

“Yeah,” says Kelly. “Remember when we used to mess around with that stuff when we were kids? I bet I could still do it.”

“Uh, I don’t know,” says David, feeling a little uncomfortable.

“Oh, come on,” says Kelly. “It’ll be fun.”

She stands up and walks over to him, putting her hands on his shoulders. “Just relax,” she says. “Let yourself go.”

David can’t help but feel a little bit sceptical. He’s always thought hypnosis was just a bunch of hocus-pocus. But he decides to humour his sister and play along.

“Okay,” he says. “I’m relaxed.”

Kelly starts to talk in a gentle, soothing voice, telling him to focus on his breathing and let his mind go blank. David closes his eyes and tries to do as she says.

After a minute or so, Kelly says, “Okay, now I’m going to count backwards from ten. When I reach one, you’ll be completely under my control.”

David smiles to himself, still not believing it’s going to work. But to his surprise, as Kelly starts counting, he begins to feel a strange sensation in his body, like he’s sinking deeper and deeper into the armchair.

When Kelly gets to one, David opens his eyes and looks at her. To his amazement, he feels completely different – relaxed, calm, and very suggestible.

“Woah,” he says, staring at her. “That actually worked.”

Kelly giggles. “I told you,” she says. “Now, David, I want you to do something for me.”

“Anything,” says David, feeling an overwhelming desire to please her.

“Okay,” says Kelly, grinning wickedly. “I want you to act like a dog. Bark for me.”

David feels a flush of embarrassment, but he can’t help himself. He drops to his hands and knees and starts woofing like a dog, tail wagging furiously.

“Good boy,” says Kelly, patting his head. “Now, roll over.”

David obeys without hesitation, rolling onto his back and wriggling around on the carpet like a happy pup.

Kelly laughs, watching him. “You’re so cute,” she says. “Now, David, I want you to do something even more embarrassing.”

David shivers with both excitement and humiliation as he eagerly moves to obey her every command. He doesn't even realize she is beginning to suggest things that he doesn't really want to do.

David rings his parents’ doorbell, having come over for a surprise visit, but it’s his younger sister Kelly who opens the door in her pyjamas and flip-flops on her bare feet. “They’re not in,” she says. “But come in anyway.” She walks back to the living room, leaving the door open.

David follows her and takes a seat on the couch. He notices that Kelly seems a bit fidgety and nervous. “Is everything okay?” he asks.

“Yeah, everything’s fine,” Kelly says, but David can tell she’s not telling the truth.

“What’s going on?” he presses.

“Well…” Kelly hesitates. “Okay, I’ll tell you, but you have to promise not to make fun of me.”

“I won’t make fun of you,” David promises.

“Okay,” Kelly takes a deep breath. “I’ve been learning hypnosis.”

David raises his eyebrows. “Hypnosis?”

“Yeah,” Kelly nods. “I’ve been reading about it and watching videos on YouTube. And I’ve been practicing on myself and on some of my friends.”

“And?”

“And… I kind of hypnotized myself once accidentally,” Kelly admits.

David laughs. “Really? That’s pretty impressive.”

“I know, right?” Kelly grins. “It was just a little induction I was pretending to do, but then all of a sudden I was in this trance. It was intense.”

“Well, I don’t believe in hypnosis,” David says.

“Yeah, I didn’t really either,” Kelly agrees. “But now that I’ve experienced it, I’m kind of intrigued.”

“Okay, I’ll admit it’s interesting,” David concedes. “But I still don’t think it’s real.”

“I’ll prove it to you,” Kelly says.

“How?”

“Let me hypnotize you.”

David laughs. “No way.”

“Come on, it’ll be fun,” Kelly pleads. “I’ll make you do silly things.”

“I don’t know,” David hesitates.

“Please, David,” Kelly begs. “I won’t do anything too embarrassing. It’ll be harmless.”

“Okay, fine,” David gives in. “But I’m warning you, I’m not going to act like a chicken or anything.”

“Oh, don’t worry,” Kelly assures him. “I’ll just make you do some basic commands.”

David rolls his eyes, but lets Kelly lead him through the induction anyway. It’s a simple process of deep breathing, imagining a relaxing scene, and counting down from ten to one. David thinks it’s all just a bunch of nonsense, but he plays along.

To his surprise, though, something strange happens. As Kelly whispers commands in his ear, David feels a strange sensation wash over him. It’s like he’s detached from his body, watching himself from the outside. He wants to resist Kelly’s commands, but he can’t. It’s like he’s in a dream, and Kelly is the only one who can control his actions.

David tries to break out of the trance, but he can’t. All he can do is obey Kelly’s every command, no matter how silly or embarrassing it may be. And Kelly takes full advantage of his hypnotized state, making him do everything from singing nursery rhymes to doing the hokey pokey to acting like a puppy.

The worst part is that David has no memory of any of it once he snaps out of the trance. It’s like his mind has been wiped clean, and he has no idea what he’s been doing for the past hour.

It’s humiliating to think that his own sister could have that much power over him, even if it was just for a short while. But at the same time, part of him is intrigued by the idea of hypnosis. Maybe it’s not just a bunch of nonsense after all.

(David’s cousin Kelly embarrassingly easily hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him even easier to hypnotize in future, and to do a few things as her submissive zombie, but she leaves him with no memory of the whole thing. David and Kelly are hanging out in the garden of his uncle’s house, David having come over for a Sunday visit. It’s a warm day, David’s drinking a beer and Kelly has taken her socks off and is lying back on a blanket.

Kelly looks over at David and notices how relaxed he looks. She decides to play a little game, pretending to hypnotize him for fun.

“David, look into my eyes,” she says, giggling.

David rolls his eyes but decides to play along. He stares into her eyes as she starts speaking in a low, calm voice.

“Imagine a staircase in your mind,” Kelly says. “With each step you take, you feel more and more relaxed.”

David listens to her words and actually starts to feel more relaxed. He closes his eyes and takes deep breaths.

“Now, imagine yourself at the bottom of the staircase. Ten steps up is a state of deep relaxation,” she continues.

David slowly starts to ascend the staircase in his mind as Kelly’s voice becomes quiet and soothing. He feels his muscles relaxing and his breathing slowing down.

“Nine… Eight… Seven…”

As she counts down the steps, David feels himself becoming more and more calm, until finally he’s at the top. He’s in a state of deep relaxation, and he can hardly move.

Kelly is surprised to see that he’s actually gone under, and she starts to feel a little nervous. She had no idea this was actually going to work.

“David, can you hear me?” she asks.

David nods slowly. His mind is blank and he can hardly think. He feels so calm and relaxed.

“Good. Now, listen carefully,” she tells him. “Every time I snap my fingers, you will go deeper into hypnosis. And the deeper you go, the more suggestions I can give you.”

David nods again, feeling like a puppet whose strings are being pulled by Kelly.

“From now on, you’re going to be my submissive zombie,” Kelly whispers. “You’ll do anything I tell you to do.”

David’s eyes widen but he feels powerless to resist her commands. He knows he should be scared, but instead he feels weirdly excited and submissive.

“And lastly, when you wake up, you won’t remember any of this,” Kelly adds, snapping her fingers.

David snaps out of his trance, feeling a little disoriented but otherwise okay. He has no idea what just happened. In fact, he doesn’t even know that for the rest of his life, he’s going to be easier to hypnotize than he was before.
When the clouds cover the sun, they go inside. David heads to the kitchen to get another beer.

As he walks into the kitchen, David notices that something feels a little different, but he can’t quite put his finger on it. He grabs a beer from the fridge and starts to open it, but then he freezes. Suddenly, he remembers Kelly’s words: “Every time I snap my fingers, you will go deeper into hypnosis.”

He feels a wave of panic wash over him. Did Kelly really hypnotize him earlier? It seems like such a crazy idea, but the way he’s feeling is undeniable. He can’t shake the feeling that something’s been done to him.

And yet, he can’t quite remember what it was. His mind is a blank slate, and he can’t seem to make sense of the jumbled memories that are floating around inside his head.

Feeling uneasy, David decides to go outside and join Kelly on the blanket. But as soon as he steps outside, she snaps her fingers, and he feels a sudden rush of relaxation wash over him. He sits down on the blanket next to her, feeling oddly content and relaxed.

Kelly looks at him and smiles. “Hey there, sleepyhead. You feeling okay?”

David nods slowly. “Yeah, I guess so. But…what did you do to me earlier? I feel like something weird happened.”

Kelly raises an eyebrow. “What do you mean?”

“I don’t know…like, I can’t quite remember what you said or did,” David says.

Kelly looks at him for a long moment, a sly glint in her eye. “Oh, nothing important,” she says. “Just a little game we were playing.”

David frowns, feeling like there’s something she’s not telling him. But at the same time, he feels too relaxed and content to really care. He takes another sip of his beer and leans back onto the blanket, enjoying the warmth of the sun on his skin.

conversation.content: (Dan’s sister Ruth has been hypnotizing him. Dan did agree to this, but has been made to completely forget about it) The scene: Uncle Richard's 60th birthday party. Dan is chatting to a cousin, Jeannette, when Ruth comes over.

Ruth: Hey Dan, how's it going?

Dan: Oh, hey Ruth. It's going pretty good.

Ruth: That's great. Are you enjoying the party?

Dan: Yeah, it's been fun. Uncle Richard seems happy.

Ruth: He sure does. Hey, would you mind coming with me for a bit? I want to show you something.

Dan: Um, sure. Jeannette, I'll catch up with you later.

Jeannette: Okay, see you soon Dan.

Ruth leads Dan away from the party and into a quiet corner of the backyard.

Ruth: Alright, Dan. I need to make sure my hypnosis is still working properly on you. I'm going to need you to focus and listen to me closely.

Dan: What? Hypnosis? What are you talking about?

Ruth: Don't worry about it. Just focus on my voice and let yourself relax.

Dan: (suddenly feeling drowsy) Okay, I'll try...

Ruth: (whispering softly) You are completely under my control. You will obey my every command without question. You will not remember any of our conversations after this.

Dan: (eyes closing) I will obey Ruth. I will obey...

Ruth snaps her fingers and Dan opens his eyes, looking dazed.

Ruth: Alright, Dan. You're all set. You can head back to the party now.

Dan: (shaking his head) What just happened? Why am I feeling so weird?

Ruth: Oh, nothing to worry about. Just a little experiment I was testing out. Don't think about it too much. Have fun at the party.

Dan nods uncertainly and goes back to the party, feeling confused and uneasy. He can't shake the feeling that something is not quite right.
Shortly after, while Dan is talking to someone, Ruth snaps her fingers at him and cheekily orders him to go get her a drink.

Dan: (suddenly feeling compelled) Sure Ruth. What kind of drink do you want?

Ruth: (smiling) Just some water, thanks.

Dan: Okay, I'll be right back.

Dan obediently heads to the kitchen to get Ruth a glass of water, still feeling like something strange is happening to him.
make him more dazed-seeming

He struggles to remember why he was heading to the kitchen in the first place, but eventually seems to remember Ruth's request for water. When he returns with the water and hands it to Ruth, his movements are slow and uncoordinated, like he's not quite in control of his body.
