conversation.content:
David works at Stella’s cafe. Stella has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t know he’s ever been hypnotized at all, but actually Stella can now put him back into trance whenever she wants with a few well-chosen words. 
One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Stella thinks it might amuse Victoria to see her friend become totally suggestible and obedient, and she comes over to join their conversation.
“You two know each other?” she smiles.

Victoria nods, “Yeah, we went to college together.”

Stella turns to David, “Do you trust Victoria?”

David nods without hesitation, “Absolutely, she’s one of my best friends.”

Stella leans in and whispers, “Sleep.”

David’s eyes flutter and he slumps forward slightly in his chair.

Victoria looks at him, concerned, “David, are you okay?”

Stella quickly interjects, “Oh, he’s just feeling a bit tired. Why don’t we go to the back and get him a glass of water?”

Victoria nods and helps David up from his chair. As they walk to the back, David seems a bit dazed, but doesn’t seem to notice anything unusual.

Once they’re in the back, Stella turns to Victoria, “You’re going to have a bit of fun with this. Whenever I say a certain phrase, David is going to do whatever you tell him.”

Victoria looks shocked, “What?! You can’t just control his mind like that!”

Stella shrugs, “It’s harmless fun. Besides, he won’t remember any of it.”

Victoria reluctantly agrees and they head back out to the cafe, where David is now sitting at a table, blankly staring ahead.

Stella leans in and whispers the phrase in Victoria’s ear. “David, go buy Victoria whatever drink she wants.”

David immediately gets up and heads to the counter, where Victoria orders a lemonade.

Stella laughs, “This is too good.”

Victoria feels uneasy about the whole situation, but decides to play along for a bit. She whispers the phrase to Stella and commands David to do a silly dance.

David does the dance, completely unaware of what he’s doing. The two girls giggle and continue to have David do silly tasks for their entertainment.

Eventually, Victoria feels guilty and tells Stella to stop. “This isn’t right. We need to snap him out of this.”

Stella nods and whispers another phrase to David, “Wake up.”

David blinks several times, looking around confused. “What happened?”

Stella just smiles, “Nothing, David. You just had a bit of a short nap.”

Victoria can’t help but feel disturbed by what just happened. She quickly finishes her drink and makes an excuse to leave.

As she’s walking out, she can’t help but wonder what other things Stella has made David do without his knowledge.

“Victoria! How are you?”

David exclaimed, giving her a big hug.

“I’m good, how are you?” Victoria asked, smiling.

“I’m good, just working all day every day,” David said, chuckling.

Stella, who was watching from behind the counter, decided it was the perfect opportunity to have a little bit of fun. She quietly walked over to David and whispered in his ear, “David, come over here and take a seat.”

David suddenly felt a strange urge to obey her and walked over to where she was standing. He sat down in the nearest chair, feeling a little confused but not questioning it too much.

“David, I’m going to count down from three and when I snap my fingers, you’re going to fall into a deep sleep, okay?” Stella said, smiling mischievously.

David nodded, feeling a little apprehensive but not wanting to disappoint his boss.

Stella counted down from three, snapping her fingers at the end. At first, David felt nothing different, but then slowly his eyes started to close and he slumped down in his chair, breathing rhythmically.

Victoria’s eyes widened in surprise and she looked at Stella, who was giggling quietly to herself.

“Is he okay?” Victoria whispered, unsure of what to do.

“He’s fine, he’ll come out of it soon,” Stella reassured her.

After a few minutes, Stella snapped her fingers again and David slowly blinked his eyes open, looking around in confusion.

“Did I fall asleep?” he asked, rubbing his eyes.

Stella and Victoria burst out laughing and David looked at them, still feeling a little disorientated.

“What’s so funny?” he asked, feeling a little annoyed at being the butt of their joke.

“Oh, nothing, it’s just that you were so deep in your sleep,” Stella said, winking at Victoria.

David didn’t know it yet, but he had just been hypnotized by Stella for the umpteenth time and he hadn’t even realized it. As he went back to work, he couldn’t shake the feeling that something strange had just happened to him.

conversation.content:
Sandra: (smirking) You know, if I didn’t know any better, I’d say you were actually enjoying this. But we both know that would never happen… right?

David: (monotone) I am only doing what you tell me to do, Sandra.

Sandra shakes her head in disbelief and grins, enjoying every moment of her brother’s hypnotized state. As David concentrates on painting her toenails perfectly, Sandra takes a few pictures on her phone, thinking about how she’ll tease him with these later.

Sandra: (slyly) Maybe I should post these pictures on social media. You know, to show everyone how obedient my little brother is.

David: (still monotone) Yes, Sandra.

Sandra chuckles and leans back, admiring her freshly painted toes.

Sandra: (casually) You know, David, I’ve been thinking. I might need your help tomorrow with something.

David: (still under hypnosis) Of course, Sandra. Whatever you need.

Sandra grins to herself, knowing that her brother will do anything she asks of him while he’s in this state. She starts to plan out all the ways she could have fun with this newfound power over him.

She gives him a trigger phrase that she can use to drop him back into trance, a hundred times deeper, whenever she uses it. Then she wakes him up, making him forget everything that happened, believing they just watched a movie.

Sandra: (smiling) Alright David, time to wake up.

David blinks a few times and looks around confused, trying to remember what had just happened.

David: (dazed) What...what happened? Did we just watch a movie?

Sandra nods, pretending to play along with his confusion.

Sandra: Yeah, we watched a movie and you fell asleep.

David: (relieved) Oh okay, good. I was worried for a second.

Sandra smiles and hands him a soda.

Sandra: Don't worry about it, David. I'll let you rest now, but I might need your help tomorrow.

David nods and finishes his soda before heading to bed. Sandra smirks to herself, already thinking of all the ways she could use her brother's hypnosis to her advantage. As she falls asleep, she thinks about the trigger phrase she gave him and how she's excited to see just how deep she can take him under.
The next day

The next day, Sandra wakes up early and heads to David's room. She softly whispers the trigger phrase in his ear and watches as he goes under, a hundred times deeper than before.

Sandra: (smiling) Good morning, David.

David: (monotone) Good morning, Sandra.

Sandra giggles at the sound of his robotic voice, feeling a rush of power knowing that she can control him in this state. She continues to give him tasks, having him clean her room and do her laundry without exerting any effort.

Sandra: (tauntingly) You know, David, this hypnotic state kind of makes you my little servant.

David: (monotone) Yes, Sandra.

Sandra grins, feeling a sense of satisfaction that she's finally in control. She spends the rest of the day experimenting with different triggers, seeing just how deep she can take David under and what tasks she can make him do.

At the end of the day, Sandra wakes David up, making him forget everything that just happened, as if he had just been dreaming. She smiles to herself, knowing that she has a secret advantage over her brother that she can use whenever she wants.

conversation.content:
Carole sometimes hypnotizes her willing husband Dan, suggesting that he become even easier to hypnotize and more unthinkingly obedient each time.

Carole’s friend Emma has recently moved house and has a lot of work to do. Carole arranges to ‘lend’ Dan to Emma for the day, giving him the hypnotic instruction to “be the perfect servant for Emma.” Dan finds himself dazedly ringing Emma’s doorbell on a warm summer morning. Emma answers the door in her bare feet, a big woman with sweaty armpits.

Dan feels his resistance melting away as Emma thanks Carole and leads him inside. She instructs him to start cleaning the kitchen while she goes to take a shower. As Dan sets to work, he feels a growing sense of emptiness, as if his mind is being drained of everything but his desire to please.

When Emma returns, she is wearing a bathrobe that barely covers her thighs, and Dan finds himself unable to look away as she instructs him to clean the bathroom next. Time seems to slip away as Dan moves from one task to another, always eager to do more for Emma. By the time she dismisses him for the day, he feels exhausted and happy, grateful for the chance to serve someone who appreciates his efforts.

As Carole greets him at the door, she notes the glazed look in his eyes and smiles to herself. She knows that Dan is more deeply hypnotized than ever before, and that he will be even more obedient the next time she uses her powers on him. With a contented sigh, she leads him to the bedroom, eager to explore the new depths of his submission.

conversation.content:
A coffee shop owned by a charismatic woman called Pippa. Indie kid Dan’s been working there for a couple of weeks, but hasn’t endeared himself to Pippa. A hot summer day, sandals weather. James, Dan’s brother-in-law (they really don’t get on) comes in to the cafe. They talk testily. Pippa comes over to introduce herself and they chat. Pippa gradually brings the conversation round to hypnotism.
Taking a liking to James, she will decide to hypnotize Dan (he’s very reluctant indeed) there and then. After a perfunctory induction, Dan will go deeply under surprisingly easily. Once Dan’s utterly hypnotized Pippa will arrange a trigger-word for James to use on Dan. Pippa will then wake him up, and encourage James to drop him straight back under using the trigger word! James will gleefully command Dan to give him a footrub, as if he’s just a slave. In a mindless trance, Dan can think only about obedience.

Title: Brewed Hypnosis

INT. COFFEE SHOP - DAY

A cozy, bustling coffee shop with rustic decor. People sip on their drinks and enjoy conversation. 

Dan, an introverted indie kid with messy hair, serves customers behind the counter. He wears a black band t-shirt and looks perpetually disinterested.

James, Dan's brash and outspoken brother-in-law, enters, wearing flip-flops and an obnoxious Hawaiian shirt. He scans the room, his eyes settling on Dan. 

James smirks and plops himself down at a table near the counter. Dan notices him but tries to avoid eye contact.

JAMES
(sarcastically)
Ah, Daniel, my favorite barista. Taking a break from your imaginary punk band today?

DAN
(through gritted teeth)
What brings you here, James? Need something to complain about today?

Their interaction is tense, filled with underlying animosity.

PIPPA, a charismatic woman in her late thirties with vibrant red hair, approaches their table, a warm smile on her face.

PIPPA
(cheerfully)
Hello! I'm Pippa, the owner. I hope you're both enjoying your time here. 

JAMES
(raising an eyebrow)
Well, I was until I encountered this ray of sunshine.

Pippa chuckles, unfazed by James' sarcastic remark.

PIPPA
(looking at Dan and James)
You two seem like you have an interesting dynamic. But hey, I've always been fascinated by the power of the mind. Are either of you familiar with hypnotism?

DAN
(skeptically)
Not really my thing, to be honest.

JAMES
(grinning)
Oh, I love a good mind game. Go on, Pippa, tell us more.

Pippa's eyes light up, pleased to find an audience receptive to her interest.

PIPPA
(excitedly)
Well, it's amazing what our minds can do when we let them. Would you mind if I showed you a small demonstration? Just to prove how susceptible the mind can be?

James nods eagerly, while Dan looks thoroughly uninterested.

PIPPA
(to Dan)
Don't worry, Dan. I promise it'll be harmless fun. Now, just relax and focus on my voice.

Pippa begins a perfunctory hypnotic induction, her voice soothing and lulling.

PIPPA
(slowly)
Breathe in deeply, Dan. Let go of any tension, any resistance. You're feeling more relaxed with each breath...

Dan, against his better judgment, begins to sink into a deep hypnotic trance surprisingly easily.

Pippa smiles triumphantly and gestures for James to come closer. Whispering, she gives him a specific trigger word.

PIPPA
(to James)
And now, whenever you say the word "obedience," Dan will go into a deep trance, ready to follow any command you give him. 

James smirks mischievously, eager to take advantage of the situation.

PIPPA
(satisfied)
Alright, Dan, time to wake up.

Pippa claps her hands, signaling Dan to awaken from his trance. He blinks, dazed but oblivious to the change in his own mind.

Pippa encourages James to use the trigger word, testing the newfound control.

JAMES
(smugly)
Obedience.

Dan's eyes glaze over, and he sits up straight, ready to fulfill any command.

James leans back in his chair, putting his feet on the table.

JAMES
(laughing)
Dan, my friend, it's time you gave me a footrub. Get to work, slave.

In a mindless trance, Dan nods robotically and moves towards James' feet, completely focused on obedience.

Title: The Trigger Word

INT. COFFEE SHOP - DAY

A bustling coffee shop on a hot summer day. LAURA, a charismatic woman in her late 30s, manages the cafe with efficiency and charm. DAN, an indie kid in his early 20s with a rebellious look, has been working at the cafe for a couple of weeks.

FIONA, Dan's sister-in-law, walks into the cafe, wearing an annoyed expression. Fiona and Dan exchange testy glances as they approach each other.

DAN
(sarcastically)
Well, well, if it isn't my lovely sister-in-law. What brings you here today?

FIONA
(exasperated)
Just passing by, thought I'd see if you're still messing up coffee orders.

LAURA notices the tension and walks over to introduce herself.

LAURA
(sincerely)
Hello there! I'm Laura, the owner of this lovely cafe. Mind if I join you both?

DAN and FIONA reluctantly agree, their animosity momentarily set aside.

LAURA
(cheerfully)
So, how do you two know each other?

DAN
(grinning)
Oh, just lucky enough to be related to her. Fiona here is married to my oh-so-perfect brother.

FIONA
(rolling her eyes)
Lucky me indeed.

LAURA
(laughing)
Well, family dynamics can be challenging. But hey, did you know I've recently started exploring the fascinating world of hypnotism?

DAN and FIONA exchange skeptical glances.

DAN
(teasingly)
You trying to hypnotize us into liking each other, Laura?

LAURA
(playfully)
Well, maybe not that exactly, but it's a tool that can help people connect on a deeper level. Would either of you be up for a little demonstration?

FIONA
(interested)
Go on, then. Let's see what you've got.

DAN
(reluctantly)
Fine, why not? But get it over with quickly.

Laura's face lights up as she prepares to hypnotize Dan. She guides him through a classic rapid induction, surprising him with how easily he falls into a hypnotic state.

INT. COFFEE SHOP - MOMENTS LATER

Dan is under a deep hypnotic trance, completely at Laura's command.

LAURA
(excitedly)
Alright, Fiona, I have implanted a trigger word in Dan's subconscious. When you say it, he will drop back into this deep state of hypnosis.

FIONA suppresses a mischievous grin as she awaits her turn to control Dan.

LAURA
(waking Dan up)
And... you're back, Dan! Feeling refreshed?

DAN blinks, unaware of what just transpired.

DAN
(dazed)
Uh... yeah, I guess so.

LAURA
(turning to Fiona)
Now, Fiona, why don't you have a go? Just say the trigger word, and watch what happens.

FIONA leans in closer, her eyes gleaming with anticipation.

FIONA
(slyly)
Cupcake.

Dan's eyes glaze over, and he enters a deep mindless trance once more.

INT. COFFEE SHOP - CONTINUOUS

FIONA
(gleefully)
Dan, my obedient slave, I command you to give me a foot massage.

Dan, devoid of free will, obediently drops to his knees and starts massaging Fiona's feet.

DAN
(zombie-like)
Yes, Fiona. I must obey.

Laura watches the scene unfold with amusement, pleased with the bond she has formed between Fiona and Dan.

FADE OUT.

conversation.content:
David works at Stella’s cafe. Stella has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t know he's ever been hypnotized at all, but actually Stella can now put him back into a submissive trance whenever she wants with a few well-chosen words. One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Victoria (straight black hair, sandals), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Stella thinks it might amuse Victoria to see her friend be put under hypnosis, and she comes over to join their conversation.
“You two know each other?” she smiles.

David nods, “Yeah, we’ve been friends since high school.”
“That’s nice,” Stella says, “David, how about you show Victoria some of your hypnosis tricks?”
David looks at Stella blankly, “Hypnosis tricks? I don’t have any.”
Stella gives a small laugh, “Oh come on David, don’t be shy. I’ve seen you do it before.”
David furrows his brow, trying to recall but coming up blank. “I’m not sure what she’s talking about, Victoria.”
Victoria looks between the two of them, sensing something odd happening. “What kind of hypnosis tricks?” she asks cautiously. 
Stella leans forward, “Oh, just some relaxation techniques. David’s very good at it.”
David starts to feel uneasy, not sure why he can’t remember doing any hypnosis before. “I really don’t feel comfortable doing it, Stella.”
Stella narrows her eyes, her voice becoming firmer. “David, listen to me. I want you to go into a deep relaxation state and follow all of my suggestions. Just like how I’ve done before.”
David feels a wave of drowsiness wash over him, his eyelids becoming heavy. Without even realizing it, he’s back under Stella’s control. 
“David, when you wake up, you will remember all of our hypnosis sessions together. And you’ll feel grateful towards me for helping you relax and feel so good. And anytime I say the word ‘sleep’, you’ll instantly go back into this state, ready to listen to my every command,” Stella whispers. 
Victoria watches in shock, realizing what’s happening. She quickly stands up and slams some cash on the counter. “I think I’ll get my drink somewhere else. I don’t feel comfortable with what’s happening,” she says sternly before marching out of the cafe. 
Stella smirks to herself, looking down at David who’s now spacing out. “Good boy,” she whispers.

Completely unaware of what’s happening, David quickly gets to work, mixing and blending various ingredients until he’s made the perfect drinks for both Sandra and Victoria. As they sip their cold beverages and chat, Sandra continues to secretly manipulate David, making him more and more subservient to her every command. 

Finally, after an hour or so, Victoria decides to say goodbye and leave the cafe. As she walks out, she can’t help but notice the slightly glazed look in David’s eyes as he waves goodbye, completely unaware of the power Sandra has over him.

Jenny leaves shortly after, still amazed at what she just witnessed. Sandra continues to hypnotize David on occasion, but he never suspects a thing. To him, it’s just another normal day at the cafe.

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

As Sandra continues to speak softly to David, Jen can see the transformation happening right before her eyes. David’s body relaxes even more, and his eyes flutter closed.

“David,” Sandra whispers, “when you wake up, you will be completely under my control. You will do anything I ask of you without hesitation.”

Jen giggles, feeling a thrill of excitement at the prospect of having David as their own personal slave for a little while.

“Now wake up, David,” Sandra says, snapping her fingers.

David’s eyes open, but they look glassy and unfocused. He blinks a few times, looking around in confusion.

“David,” Sandra says, her voice taking on a commanding tone, “I want you to do something for me. I want you to go outside and bring me back a flower.”

conversation.content:
(Jen (25) overweight, sandals; Sandra (49) tie-dye, glasses)
(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David right in front of his friend, to Jen’s surprise and delighted glee. Later Sandra will make him her mindless footstool.)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink.

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

Sandra greets her warmly, but Jen can’t help but notice the tie-dye shirt and quirky glasses. Sandra seems a bit eccentric.

They chat for a bit, then Sandra asks David to step aside to help her with something in the back. Jen is left alone at the table, sipping her drink and scrolling through her phone.

After a few minutes, Sandra and David return. Sandra is looking particularly pleased with herself. She asks David to stand in front of her.

“Now David, I want you to relax and look into my eyes,” she says in a low, soothing voice. Jen watches with curiosity as Sandra starts to hypnotize David.

To her surprise, Jen sees David’s face go slack and his body turn rigid. Sandra starts to give him commands, like “You will always do exactly as I say” and “You love the sound of my voice.”

Jen can’t believe what she’s seeing. Is this really happening?

Suddenly, Sandra snaps her fingers and David seems to come out of his trance. He blinks a few times and shakes his head as if coming out of a deep sleep.

“Did something just happen?” he asks, sounding confused.

Jen watches as Sandra smiles quietly to herself. She knows that David has no idea what just happened to him.

As they continue to talk, Jen can’t help but glance down at Sandra’s feet. She’s wearing a pair of comfortable sandals that look like they’ve seen better days. Suddenly, Jen has an idea.

“Hey, Sandra,” she says, glancing down at her feet. “I’ve been wanting to try those sandals on. Would it be okay if I borrowed them for a minute?”

Sandra nods absentmindedly, still deep in thought. Jen slips off her own shoes and eagerly slides her feet into the sandals.

As soon as her feet touch the ground, she feels a strange sensation run through her body. She feels like she’s been transported into a different world.

“David, would you mind bringing me a glass of water?” Sandra asks, interrupting Jen’s thoughts. “And while you’re at it, why don’t you sit down at my feet and enjoy the view? You’re such a good boy.”

David nods obediently and heads to the back to get the water. Jen can’t believe what she’s seeing. Sandra is treating David like a total footstool, and he seems to be enjoying every moment of it.

As Jen finishes her drink and puts her shoes back on, she can’t help but smile to herself. She knows that she’s just witnessed something truly strange and amazing, and she can’t wait to see what will happen next.

conversation.content:
(As far as he knows, David has never been hypnotized before. Actually, his boss at the cafe, Stella, has been hypnotizing him for weeks and making him forget about it afterwards. She’d like to casually snap him under in front of someone else, again without him realizing, for them to see him totally in her power. The idea turns her on actually)

On a very hot July afternoon (sandal weather), the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while. (Stella doesn’t know her)

“Victoria! How are you?”

David exclaimed, giving her a warm hug.

“I’m good, how about you?” Victoria replied, taking a seat at the bar.

“I’m doing alright,” David said, flashing her a smile. “What can I get for you?”

“I’ll have a latte, please.”

David nodded and began preparing her order, Stella watching from the back of the cafe.

As David handed Victoria her latte, Stella made her way to the front and greeted Victoria.

“Hi, I’m Stella. I own this place. Nice to meet you,” she said, extending her hand.

“Nice to meet you too,” Victoria replied, shaking her hand.

“So, David here is quite the star employee,” Stella said, grinning at David. “He’s so good, he doesn’t even need supervision.”

David chuckled at this, not realizing the weight of Stella’s words.

“I bet he’s a quick learner,” Victoria added.

“Actually, he’s a little slow sometimes,” Stella replied, still grinning. “But that’s okay, because he’s such a good listener.”

David looked at her quizzically, but didn’t say anything.

“Isn’t that right, David?” Stella said, her tone changing slightly.

David felt an odd sensation in the pit of his stomach, but he couldn’t quite put his finger on why.

“Uh, yeah,” he answered hesitantly.

“Good boy,” Stella said, her voice becoming a little softer.

David felt a wave of relaxation wash over him, his eyes briefly closing.

Victoria watched the exchange curiously, but couldn’t quite figure out what was happening.

Stella snapped her fingers and David blinked, returning to his senses.

“Okay, well, I better get back to work,” David said, suddenly feeling energized.

Stella looked at him, still grinning.

“You do that, David,” she said. “You’re doing a great job.”

As she walked away, Victoria turned to David, a puzzled expression on her face.

“Is everything okay?” she asked.

David glanced at her, a small smile on his face.

“Yeah, everything’s fine,” he replied. “Just a little tired, I guess.”

Victoria nodded, but couldn’t shake the feeling that something weird had just happened.

conversation.content:
(As far as he knows, David has never been hypnotized before. Actually, his boss at the cafe, Stella, has been hypnotizing him for weeks and making him forget about it afterwards. She’d like for someone else to see how easily she can make David so obedient he'll mindlessly massage feet on command! The idea turns her on actually)

On a very hot July afternoon (sandal weather), the cafe was pretty quiet. David was just refilling the fridge when the door opened and in came a good friend of his he hadn’t seen for a while. (Stella doesn’t know her)

"Hey man, long time no see!" David said, giving his friend a warm hug.

"Yeah, it's been forever. How have you been?" his friend replied.

"I've been good, just working here at the cafe. Stella is my boss, she's actually the one who hired me," David explained.

Stella smiled at the mention of her name and walked over to greet David's friend. "Hi there, I'm Stella. Nice to meet you," she said with a friendly smile.

"Nice to meet you too," his friend replied.

As the three of them chatted, Stella noticed how David was constantly glancing at her, almost as if he was waiting for her to give him some kind of signal. She realized that she might have hypnotized him before and he was subconsciously responding to her.

Without saying anything to his friend, Stella decided to put David to the test. She casually slipped into the conversation, "David, could you grab me a glass of water? My throat is feeling dry."

David immediately nodded and walked over to get her water, almost as if he was in a trance. Stella smiled to herself and turned to his friend. "He's such a good listener, isn't he?"

His friend shrugged. "I guess so. But you know, I was just thinking that it might be fun to get a foot massage. My feet have been bothering me all day."

Stella saw an opportunity to push David further. "Oh, David gives amazing foot massages. In fact, he's kind of an expert at it. Would you like him to give you one?"

David returned with the glass of water and heard Stella's question. Without hesitation, he nodded and said, "Of course, I'd love to help."

Stella grinned to herself, knowing that David was completely under her control. She leaned over to whisper in his ear, "David, go ahead and give her a foot massage. And remember, you'll forget about this later."

David obediently got down on his knees and began massaging his friend's feet. His friend was surprised by how skilled he was at massaging, but Stella was getting turned on seeing how easily she could manipulate him.

As David finished the foot massage, Stella whispered in his ear again, "You did a great job, David. Now go back to your work."

David nodded and returned to his duties, completely unaware of what had just happened. Stella turned back to his friend and continued chatting, secretly plotting how she could further experiment with David's hypnotic abilities.

conversation.content:
[Cara and Rebecca sometimes hypnotize their friend Dennis, giving him suggestions to be docile and easy to hypnotize. Dennis doesn’t mind, just wants to do as he’s told.]
It was a warm June day. Cara and Dennis were waiting in the park at the end of the 10K route. Rebecca should be arriving at the finish any time now, if her practice times were anything to go by.

As they waited, Cara began to idly swing a pocket watch back and forth in front of Dennis’s eyes, noticing how easily he fell into a trance.

“Dennis, I want you to listen to my words and do exactly as I say,” Cara spoke softly, her voice lulling him gently into a state of relaxation.

“Yes, Cara,” he responded obediently.

“From now on, whenever you hear the word ‘sleep’ from Rebecca or me, you will immediately close your eyes and enter a deep, hypnotic state. You will be relaxed and open to any suggestions we may give you.”

Dennis’s eyes widened a little at first, but then he nodded slowly in agreement.

“Very good, Dennis. Now, when Rebecca arrives, I want you to greet her and then lie down on the grass beside her. You will be completely limp and relaxed, ready and waiting for any suggestions we may give you.”

“Okay, Cara,” he replied, his tone flat and monotone.

A few moments later, Rebecca came into view, jogging towards them. As she approached, Dennis greeted her warmly and then obediently lay down beside her on the grass, his body immediately going limp.

Rebecca grinned over at Cara, impressed by her friend’s hypnotic skills. Together, they began to give Dennis a series of suggestions, knowing that he would remain relaxed and open to whatever they wanted to do with him.

For Dennis, there was nothing quite as pleasing as being hypnotized and controlled by his two friends. He trusted them completely and enjoyed the sensation of letting go, allowing them to guide him wherever they wanted to take him.

conversation.content: (David’s wife Catherine sometimes uses hypnosis on him) Catherine has made an arrangement with a friend of hers, Emma, to send her husband David over to do Emma’s housework for her, and anything else she might tell him to do. David is a fairly docile guy and is willing to do whatever Catherine wants. In a daze, he knocks, and Emma opens the door, smirking, wearing a sweater, jeans and flip-flops.

"Hello, David," Emma says with a sly smile. "I'm so glad you're here to help me out today."

David nods in a trance-like state, not quite understanding what he's doing there.

"I need you to start by cleaning the bathroom," Emma tells him, leading him to the small room off the hallway. "And then maybe you could dust the living room, vacuum the carpets..."

As Emma lists off tasks for David to do, he obediently follows her commands, moving from room to room and cleaning everything as she asks. He doesn't even realize how much time has passed until Emma calls him back to the living room.

"That's enough for today, David," she says, smiling at him again. "You can go home now."

David nods and leaves the house, still feeling a bit dazed and confused. He wonders why he was doing housework for someone he barely knows, but doesn't remember much else about the experience. Later, when Catherine hypnotizes him again, he won't even remember the incident at all.
Emma phones Catherine, laughing.

"Hey, Catherine, your little experiment worked like a charm," Emma says between giggles. "David was like putty in my hands."

Catherine chuckles in response. "I'm glad it worked out. Did he do everything you asked him to?"

"Yep, and more," Emma replies. "I even got him to fix a leaky faucet and hang some shelves in the spare room. You're right, he's a real asset to have around for some extra help."

Catherine thanks her friend and tells her she's glad she could be of service. They chat for a few more minutes before ending the call.

Meanwhile, David is on his way home, still feeling a bit confused but strangely satisfied with his day's tasks. He'll never know that he was actually under hypnosis, but Catherine will continue to use her powers to get him to do whatever she wants, whenever she wants.
Catherine shows off her ability to drop David in a finger snap when the two of them go shopping.

As Catherine and David walk through the mall, Catherine suddenly snaps her fingers, and David immediately freezes in place.

"Watch this," Catherine says with a smile, turning David's head to look in a different direction. "David, do you see that shoe store over there?"

David nods in response, unable to move any part of his body other than his eyes.

"I want you to walk over there and buy me a pair of those red pumps," Catherine continues. "Can you do that for me?"

Again, David nods obediently, and Catherine snaps her fingers again, releasing him from his trance.

"Off you go," she says with a playful grin, watching as David strides off towards the shoe store without hesitation.

Catherine can't help but feel a little bit of a thrill as she watches David do her bidding without any hesitation or resistance. She knows that her powers are strong and that she can make David do anything she wants him to do. But at the same time, she also feels a twinge of guilt for taking advantage of him like this. It's a complicated mix of emotions, but for now, she's content to enjoy David's devoted obedience.
write this with the shoe shop worker watching her put him under and give the reaction and conversation

The worker can't quite believe what she's seeing as Catherine points to a pair of red pumps and instructs David to buy them for her. David obediently picks up the shoes and brings them to the counter, still in a trance-like state.

The worker can't help but feel a little uneasy about the whole situation. She's not quite sure what's going on or if David is okay. As Catherine pays for the shoes, the worker clears her throat.

"Excuse me, ma'am," she says politely. "Is your friend okay?"

Catherine flashes a smile. "Oh, yes, he's just very suggestible," she replies. "I have a bit of a talent for hypnosis, you see. It's quite harmless, really."

The worker nods, still feeling uneasy but not wanting to offend Catherine. As the two women continue their conversation, David stands quietly beside them, still under Catherine's spell.

Finally, Catherine snaps her fingers once more, and David blinks awake, looking a little disoriented.

"Here you go, dear," Catherine says, handing him the shoes. "Wasn't that quick and easy?"

David nods, still unsure of what just happened. The worker hands Catherine her receipt and watches as they both leave the store, feeling slightly relieved but also a little bewildered by the experience.

David sits down obediently, feeling like he has no choice in the matter. Gina picks up one of the books and starts reading out loud.

David feels himself slipping into a trance as Gina continues to read. He feels like he is floating in a cloud of warm air, completely relaxed and at peace. Gina's voice becomes a distant murmur as he sinks deeper and deeper into the trance.

"David, when I snap my fingers, you will wake up feeling refreshed and full of energy. You will do whatever I tell you to do without hesitation or question. When I snap my fingers again, you will forget everything that has happened tonight and will remember nothing until I tell you to."

Gina snaps her fingers and David wakes up, feeling awake and alert. He looks at Gina with a blank expression, waiting for her to give him his instructions.

Jeannette leans in and whispers a trigger phrase in Ruth's ear, making sure David is out of earshot. "Whenever you say 'sleepytime,' David will instantly fall into a deep trance and be completely under your control," Jeannette says to Ruth.

Ruth's eyes light up with excitement at the prospect of having this kind of power over her brother whenever she wants. "Thank you, Jeannette. This is going to be so much fun," she says, giggling.

Jeannette smiles, knowing that the experiment has gone even better than she could have hoped. She warns Ruth to use the trigger phrase carefully and not to take advantage of David too much, but Ruth doesn't seem to care. She is eager to see how far she can push her hypnotized brother.

As David leaves, still in a daze from the hypnosis, Ruth tests out the trigger phrase. "Sleepytime," she says, and David instantly drops back into a trance, ready to do whatever his sister tells him to do.

Jeannette watches from a distance, wondering how far these two will take their newfound power dynamic. She can't wait to see what they come up with next.
David and Ruth are at their parents' house for Sunday lunch.

As they sit down for Sunday lunch, David can't help but feel a sense of unease. He knows that Ruth has the power to hypnotize him at any moment, and he's not sure he wants to give her that kind of control over him.

Ruth, however, seems to be enjoying herself immensely. She keeps giving David subtle commands, making him pour her drinks and passing her dishes. David obeys without question, even though he can feel his resistance slipping away with each passing moment.

Their parents seem oblivious to what's going on, chatting away and enjoying their meal. It's almost a relief for David, as he can at least escape from Ruth's hold for a little while.

But then, as they finish their dessert, Ruth leans in and whispers the trigger phrase in David's ear. "Sleepytime," she says, and David instantly falls into a trance.

Ruth grins and turns to their parents. "Mom, Dad, do you want to see something cool?" she asks.

David stands up, still in a trance, and begins to perform a series of strange movements, like a living statue. Their parents look on in amazement, not realizing what's really going on.

Jeannette watches from afar, feeling a twinge of guilt for what she's started. She knew that Ruth would take advantage of the hypnosis, but she had hoped that she would use it more responsibly.

As the lunch comes to an end, Ruth snaps her fingers, and David comes out of the trance, looking bewildered. He has no memory of what just happened, and it's clear that Ruth has erased any traces of their hypnotic episode from his mind.

Jeannette can't help but feel a sense of sadness as she watches David and Ruth leave. She knows that their relationship will never be the same again, and that she bears some of the responsibility for that.

As she cleans up the dishes, she resolves to be more careful with her hypnotic experiments in the future. She has seen firsthand the damage that can be caused when power falls into the wrong hands.

Sandra leans over David, her face inches away from his.

David: (nodding) Yes, Sandra. Right away.

Sandra watches as David leaves the room, feeling a sense of satisfaction. She knows that she can make him do anything she wants, and she can’t wait to see what else she can make him do with her newfound power.
Sandra and her friends are at the mall and they see Sandra's brother David there. Of course, Sandra's friends have all seen the pictures.

Sandra and her friends are walking through the mall when they spot David at a shoe store. Sandra can’t help but smirk as she thinks about the pictures she took of him painting her toenails and giving her a foot massage.

Sandra: (whispering to her friends) There’s my brother. You know, the one I hypnotized.

Sophie, one of Sandra’s friends, raises an eyebrow.

Sophie: (skeptically) You hypnotized your brother? Yeah, right. What did you make him do, paint your toenails or something?

Sandra grins mischievously.

Sandra: (smirking) Funny you should say that…

Sandra shows her friends the pictures on her phone, and they all burst out laughing.

Sophie: (laughing) Oh my god, that’s hilarious. So, can you make him do anything you want now?

Sandra nods, feeling a sense of power.

Sandra: (smiling) Yeah, I have a trigger phrase that I can use to put him under whenever I want.

Sophie: (intrigued) That’s so cool. Can you make him do something for us?

Sandra nods, thinking of what she can make her brother do to impress her friends.

Sandra: (grinning) Let’s go talk to him and I’ll show you.

Sandra and her friends approach David, who greets them warmly.

David: Hey, sis. What are you guys up to?

Sandra: (smiling sweetly) Hi, David. I was wondering if you could help us out. We’re looking for a store that sells those fuzzy socks, and we got lost. Could you show us where they are?

David nods, happy to help.

David: Yeah, sure. They’re just down the hall. I’ll take you there.

As they walk, Sandra gets a mischievous twinkle in her eye. She leans over to David and whispers the trigger phrase. Instantly, David’s eyes glaze over and he falls under her spell.

Sandra: (whispering) David, when we get to the store, I want you to go up to the salesperson and ask them if they have any pink fuzzy socks on sale. And make sure you do it in your best Scooby-Doo voice.

David: (monotone) Yes, Sandra. I will do it in my best Scooby-Doo voice.

Sandra grins, watching as David follows her commands without question. Her friends look on in amazement as David approaches the salesperson and asks for the socks in his best Scooby-Doo voice, just as Sandra instructed.

Sophie: (laughing) Oh my god, that’s hilarious.

Sandra: (grinning) I know, right?

David finishes his task and the girls return home, with Sandra secretly grinning from ear to ear and her friends still laughing about David's Scooby-Doo arpartion.

Sandra: (thinking to herself) This hypnosis thing is so much fun. I can’t wait to see what else I can make my brother do.

conversation.content:
Carole sometimes hypnotizes her willing husband Dan, suggesting that he become even easier to hypnotize and more unthinkingly obedient each time.

Carole’s plain and overweight friend Emma has recently moved house and has a lot of work to do. Carole arranges to ‘lend’ Dan to Emma for the day, giving him the hypnotic instruction that “all you want to do is obey Emma's orders” Dan finds himself dazedly ringing Emma’s doorbell on a warm summer morning. Emma answers the door with a smirk, wearing sweatpants and flip-flops.

She greets Dan and invites him inside, immediately putting him to work. Emma orders Dan to clean her entire house from top to bottom, including the bathrooms and the backyard. Dan obediently complies, not questioning any of Emma’s commands. He spends hours scrubbing floors, washing dishes, and mowing the lawn, completely under Emma’s control.

As the day wears on, Emma becomes more and more demanding, enjoying the power she has over Dan. She orders him to do embarrassing tasks, like trying on her clothes or singing her favorite songs in front of her. Dan does everything she asks without hesitation, completely subservient to her will.

Carole checks in with Emma later that day, pleased to hear how helpful and obedient Dan has been. Emma tells Carole about all the things she’s made Dan do, giggling with delight. Carole congratulates her friend and tells her to keep Dan for as long as she needs him.

Meanwhile, Dan remains in a hypnotic state, following Emma’s every command without question. He has no idea how much time has passed or what he’s been doing, only that he must continue to obey Emma’s orders. Carole knows that when Dan returns home, he’ll be even more easily hypnotized, making him an even more perfect slave for their private games.

conversation.content:
Sharon has hypnotized her work colleague Dan a few times now. The first time was literally an accident, but once Sharon realized what she'd done, she gave Dan suggestions that he liked being hypnotized and that he'd get easier and easier to put under.
One lunchtime in the break room, with a few colleagues sitting around eating, Sharon had an idea. She slipped her feet out of her work pumps. "Hey, Dan."

Dan looked up from his sandwich. "Yeah, Sharon?"

"Do you remember how relaxed and calm you felt when I hypnotized you last time?"

Dan nodded slowly.

"Well, I thought it might be fun to try something new. How about if I hypnotize you again, but this time, every time I wiggle my toes, you'll feel a wave of relaxation wash over you."

The colleagues around them looked on in surprise as Dan agreed eagerly, almost too eager.

"Okay," Sharon said, as she started to wiggle her toes in her stockings. "Just watch my feet, Dan, and let yourself go into a deep state of relaxation."

Almost instantly, Dan's eyes began to droop and his breathing became slow and even. Sharon watched with satisfaction as his body slumped forward in his seat, totally under her control.

For the rest of the lunch hour, Sharon played with Dan's mind, using simple suggestions to make him feel happy, relaxed, and obedient. A few times, she wiggled her toes just for the pleasure of seeing him slip even deeper into trance, his eyes rolling back in his head.

By the time lunch was over and Sharon had returned to her desk, Dan was back to his normal self, unaware of what had happened.

But for Sharon, the thrill of having such power over someone was irresistible. She knew that she was starting to develop a real addiction to hypnosis, and she wasn't sure if she could ever stop.

conversation.content:
Sharon has hypnotized her work colleague Dan a few times now. The first time was just an experiment, but Dan said he kind of liked the feeling, it was relaxing. She put him under again, and gave him suggestions that he was laughably easy to hypnotize (“you want everyone to see just how submissive you can be, Dan” “yes Sharon”)
One day after work, a few of them had gone to the pub for a drink. Sharon glanced over at Dan, who was talking to Annie, a young colleague. Sharon felt a pang of jealousy for a moment. “Hey, Dan. Mind if I show everyone something?”

Dan looked up at her, still in a mild trance from their previous session. “Of course, Sharon. Whatever you want me to do.”

Sharon smiled, feeling a bit mischievous. “Great. Stand up and come over here.”

Dan obediently got up from his seat and walked over to her. Sharon turned to the group of colleagues and announced, “Watch this, everyone.”

She snapped her fingers and Dan’s eyes immediately glazed over. Sharon whispered in his ear, “Dan, I want you to kiss me.”

Without hesitation, Dan leaned in and planted a soft kiss on her lips. The rest of the group gasped in surprise, but Sharon just grinned, pleased with herself.

As Dan came out of the trance, he looked embarrassed and confused. Sharon quickly reassured him and the group that it was just a bit of fun and that he wouldn’t remember anything once he was fully awake.

But Sharon couldn’t help feeling a bit guilty about taking advantage of Dan’s suggestibility. She decided to avoid hypnotizing him in the future and found other ways to have fun with her colleagues.

conversation.content:
David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (mid-fifties, glasses) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jenny (overweight, sandals, red toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Jenny to see how easily her friend can be made to become their hypnotized slave for a little while, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

David nods absentmindedly, his eyes fixated on Sandra’s glasses.

“Well, David, I’ve been thinking,” Sandra says, her voice hypnotic. “Wouldn’t it be fun if you became my obedient little slave for a little while?”

David’s eyes glaze over as he nods, completely under Sandra’s control.

Jenny looks on in shock, not sure what to do. But before she can say anything, Sandra adds, “Don’t worry, Jenny, it’ll wear off soon enough.”

Jenny watches as David snaps out of his trance, looking around the cafe in confusion. She quickly grabs her drink and makes an excuse to leave.

As she walks home, she can’t shake the feeling that something isn’t right. She decides to do some research on hypnosis, determined to find out what Sandra is up to.

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra (in her mid-fifties) has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One hot summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jenny (in her twenties, overweight, sandals and red toenails), popped in to say hello and get a cold drink. When she realizes the two are friends, Sandra thinks it might amuse Jenny to see how easily her friend can be made to become her hypnotized slave for a little while, and she comes over to join their conversation.

“You two know each other?” she smiles.

“Yeah, we’ve been friends for a few years now,” Jenny replies.

Sandra looks at David and says, “David, I want you to do something for me. I want you to stand up and dance for us.”

Without hesitation, David stands up and starts dancing a silly dance, unaware of what he’s doing.

Jenny looks at Sandra with confusion and asks, “What did you do?”

Sandra leans in and whispers, “I just hypnotized him.”

Jenny is shocked. “You hypnotized him without his knowledge or consent?”

Sandra nods. “Yes, I’ve been doing it for a while now. He doesn’t even remember it.”

Jenny is appalled and angry. “That’s a huge violation of his privacy and trust! You need to stop doing that immediately.”

Sandra looks sheepish. “I’m sorry, I didn’t realize it was wrong.”

Jenny shakes her head and turns to David. “David, do you want Sandra to keep hypnotizing you without your knowledge?”

David looks at Jenny, confused. “What do you mean?”

Jenny explains the situation to him and David is shocked. “I had no idea she was doing that. That’s not right.”

Sandra apologizes again and promises to never hypnotize David without his consent again. From that day forward, Jenny keeps a close eye on their interactions to make sure David is not being hypnotized without his knowledge.

(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David right in front of his friend and make him their submissive slave for a little while, to Jen’s amazement and amused glee)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. Jen’s wearing a dress, cardigan and flip-flops

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

"Yeah, David and I go way back," Jen says, taking a seat at one of the empty tables.

Sandra smiles and glances over at David, who is standing behind the counter, wiping down the espresso machine. "Well, Jen, I have a little surprise for you. Watch this."

Sandra walks over to David and places her hand on his forehead. David's expression immediately goes blank as Sandra begins to whisper into his ear. Jen watches in amazement as David seems to be completely under Sandra's control.

"David, when I snap my fingers, you will become my submissive slave," Sandra commands. She snaps her fingers and immediately David's posture changes. He stands up straighter, his eyes glazed over.

"David, take off your apron and bring it to me," Sandra orders.

David obediently removes his apron and brings it to Sandra, who tosses it aside. Jen can't believe what she's seeing. David is usually so confident and in control, but now he's completely under Sandra's power.

"David, you will now do everything I say," Sandra commands. "Yes, Mistress," David responds. Jen can't help but laugh.

Sandra orders David to clean the counters, sweep the floors, and take out the trash. Each time she commands him to do something, he responds with "Yes, Mistress" and immediately follows through with her instructions.

Jen watches in amazement as Sandra demonstrates her hypnotic powers over David. She can't help but feel a little jealous. She's always been attracted to David, but now he's completely focused on Sandra.

After a few minutes, Sandra snaps her fingers again and David comes out of his trance. He looks around, confused.

"What happened?" he asks.

Sandra just smiles. "Nothing, David. You were just helping me with some chores."

Jen can't stop laughing. "David, you were completely under her spell. It was amazing!"

David shakes his head, still a little dazed. "I don't remember anything."

Sandra and Jen share a knowing smile as David goes back to work, still completely unaware of what had just happened.
"Can you show me how to do that?!"

Jen asks excitedly, intrigued by the hypnotic power that Sandra has over David.

Sandra chuckles. "Hypnosis isn't something you can just learn overnight, Jen. It takes practice and skill."

"But you made it look so easy," Jen protests.

Sandra smiles. "It may look easy, but it requires a lot of focus and concentration. Plus, it's important to always be ethical and not use hypnosis to manipulate or harm others."

Jen nods, understanding that hypnosis is a powerful tool that should be used responsibly.

"Well, maybe you can teach me sometime?" Jen asks hopefully.

Sandra considers for a moment before nodding. "Sure, I could give you some basic tips and techniques to get started. But remember, it's important to always practice safely and with consent."

Jen grins with anticipation. She can't wait to learn more about the mysterious world of hypnosis.

A friend of David’s, Megan (Stella doesn’t know her), comes into the cafe one hot afternoon (sandals weather) and is pleasantly surprised to see David.

David greets Megan warmly and they chat for a few minutes before Stella interrupts. She greets Megan with a polite smile, but then turns to David and says in a commanding tone, "David, go to the back room and bring me the red bag."

David immediately stands up and walks towards the back room without question or hesitation. Megan looks confused and asks, "What's going on? Why did he just leave like that?"

Stella smiles and says, "Oh, I've been practicing hypnosis with him. He's very suggestible and goes into trance easily."

Megan is shocked and a little disturbed by this revelation. She watches as David returns with the red bag and hands it to Stella, who thanks him and then dismisses him back to his duties.

conversation.content:
[Cara and Rebecca sometimes hypnotize their friend Dennis, giving him suggestions to be docile and easy to hypnotize. Dennis doesn’t mind, just wants to do as he’s told.]
It was a warm June day. Cara and Dennis were waiting in the park at the end of the 10K route. Rebecca should be arriving at the finish any time now, if her practice times were anything to go by.
[Rebecca finishes the race and comes over to sit on the grass, taking off her sweaty trainers and socks]

Cara brought over a bottle of water for Rebecca and a cold drink for Dennis. As they sat and chatted, Cara mentioned that she had been practicing her hypnosis skills and she had some new suggestions for Dennis if he was interested.

Dennis, always eager to please, said that he was willing to give it a try. Rebecca was curious and asked Cara to hypnotize Dennis right then and there, on the grassy hill.

Cara instructed Dennis to focus on a point in the distance and take deep breaths. Slowly, she counted down from 10 to 1 and when she reached 1, Dennis' eyes were closed and his body was limp.

"Whenever you hear the word 'sleep' from now on, you will close your eyes and become completely relaxed and open to my suggestions," Cara said.

Rebecca watched in amazement as Dennis listened and responded to Cara's every command. His body was like putty in her hands. She told Dennis that he would become even more receptive to her hypnotic suggestions over time, and he nodded in agreement.

When it was time to go, Cara brought Dennis out of his trance and he shook his head, trying to clear it.

"Wow, that was wild," he said, grinning. "Can we do that again sometime?"

Rebecca and Cara exchanged a knowing look. They both enjoyed having their own personal hypnotized puppet to play with. And Dennis didn't seem to mind one bit.

“Yes, I am,” replied Dan, slightly nervous about the unexpected meeting.

“We’ve noticed that you’ve been slacking off on your work lately,” said Justine, frowning. “Your colleagues have brought it to my attention.”

Dan felt a surge of irritation towards his colleagues. He didn’t think he was slacking off at all. In fact, he had been working harder than ever before.

“I’m sorry if I’ve given that impression,” he said, trying to defend himself.

“It’s not just that,” said Justine. “We’re also concerned about your behavior.”

Dan felt a chill run down his spine. He had no idea what she was talking about.

“What do you mean?” he asked.

“We’ve noticed that you’ve been ignoring your female colleagues,” said Justine. “You don’t talk to them as much as you used to, and you seem distant. Is everything okay?”

Dan was taken aback. He hadn’t realized his behavior towards his female colleagues had changed. He had been so caught up in his work that he hadn’t paid much attention to them.

“I’m sorry,” he said, feeling embarrassed. “I didn’t realize I was doing that. I’ll make sure to be more friendly from now on.”

“That’s good to hear,” said Justine, smiling. “In fact, I have a little exercise that could help you with that.”

Before Dan knew it, he was staring into Justine’s eyes, completely mesmerized. He didn’t know what was happening, but it felt like he was in a trance. Justine’s voice seemed to echo in his mind, telling him to be more friendly towards his female colleagues and to be more open with them.

The next thing Dan knew, he was back at his desk, feeling strangely energized. He didn’t know what had happened in Justine’s office, but he felt like a weight had been lifted off his shoulders.

Over the next few days, Dan found himself chatting more with his female colleagues and even going out for drinks with them after work. He couldn’t explain why, but he felt more comfortable around them than he ever had before.

It wasn’t until a few weeks later that he overheard his female colleagues whispering about Justine’s hypnotic powers. Dan felt a sense of betrayal. Had Justine really hypnotized him without his knowledge or consent?

He didn’t know what to do. Should he confront Justine about it? Should he report her to HR? He didn’t want to risk losing his job, but he also couldn’t ignore what had happened.

As the days went by, Dan found it harder and harder to concentrate at work. He couldn’t shake the feeling that he had been manipulated by Justine.

In the end, he decided to confront her. He waited until everyone else had left the office and then knocked on her door.

“Justine, we need to talk,” he said, staring her down.

Justine looked up at him, a faint smile on her lips.

“What’s on your mind, Dan?”

“I know what you did to me,” said Dan, his voice shaking with anger. “You hypnotized me without my consent, didn’t you?”

Justine leaned back in her chair, looking unfazed.

“And if I did?”

“It’s not right,” said Dan. “You can’t just go around manipulating people like that.”

Justine chuckled.

“You’re right, I can’t,” she said. “But you’d be surprised how easy it is to hypnotize someone who’s already susceptible.”

“What do you mean?” asked Dan, feeling a sense of dread in the pit of his stomach.

“Let’s just say I’ve been doing some research,” said Justine, tapping her finger on the desk. “Some people are more suggestible than others, and you, my dear Dan, are one of the most suggestible people I’ve ever met.”

Dan felt his blood run cold. He stood there, rooted to the spot, as Justine continued to talk about the power of suggestion and hypnosis.

In the end, Dan quit his job and never looked back. He didn’t want to be around someone who could manipulate him so easily. He also didn’t want to be caught up in any illegal or unethical practices.

Years later, he heard that Justine had been fired for similar misconduct, but he never spoke to her again. He had learned his lesson the hard way: always be wary of those who have the power to hypnotize.

conversation.content: As the days went by, David enjoyed working at Stella’s cafe. She offered to hypnotize him each morning before the doors opened, and soon he was extremely conditioned and easy to drop into an utterly submissive trance with a word or a finger snap from Stella. One warm day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s friends, Victoria, popped in to say hello and get a cuppa. (When she realizes the two are friends, Stella can’t help showing off to Victoria using a few of the post-hypnotic commands she’s implanted in David’s mind)

"David here is such a good boy," Stella said with a smirk as she snapped her fingers and watched David immediately stand up from behind the counter and come to her side.

Victoria raised her eyebrows in surprise and looked at David with concern. "Are you okay, Dave? Why are you acting like that?"

David blinked and shook his head, as if coming out of a daze. "I'm fine," he said, smiling sheepishly. "Just a little tired maybe."

Stella chuckled. "Don't worry about him, Victoria. He's just under my spell. I can make him do anything I want with a word or a snap. Watch this."

She snapped her fingers again and David immediately dropped to his knees in front of her, his eyes glazed over as he waited for her next command.

Victoria's mouth fell open in shock. "What the hell? Stella, why are you doing this to him?"

Stella shrugged and looked amused. "I just like having a willing and obedient slave, Victoria. And David here is more than happy to serve me in any way I ask."

David nodded eagerly, his eyes still fixed on Stella as she snapped her fingers again and again, making him perform various tasks like fetching her a drink or kneeling at her feet.

Victoria shook her head in disbelief and turned to leave. "I can't believe you're doing this to him," she said, her voice shaking with anger and disgust. "This isn't right, Stella. You need to stop."

But Stella just laughed and waved goodbye to Victoria as she walked out the door. "Don't worry, Victoria. David's mine now. And he's loving every minute of it."

Stella is a rather businesslike old hippie. At her cafe “Stella’s” there’s a distinct seventies bohemian vibe. Stella mainly employs young people. Stella’s into stuff like beads, tie-dye, meditation and particularly hypnosis. She even hypnotizes the staff sometimes.

It’s a hot summer day. Indie kid Dan has not long started work at Stella’s and his cousin Jeannine, who he doesn’t really get on that well with, has unexpectedly popped in to see how he’s getting on and maybe have a cold drink.

[spoiler: When Stella sees that they know each other, she will come over to the counter to introduce herself. Stella will show Jeannine how she can snap her fingers to re-hypnotize Dan into a deep trance for Jeannine’s amusement and command him to offer his cousin a foot massage (removing her sandals), & YES, IT’S VERY HUMILIATING (of course it must be - he’s mindlessly massaging his cousin’s bare feet & she relishes his servility!) Finally, Stella will tell Jeannine a simple post-hypnotic footrub phrase she can use on Dan in future.]

[Content Warning: The following text describes a potentially uncomfortable and humiliating situation. Reader discretion is advised.]

As the hot summer day continues, Dan and Jeannine find a table outside Stella's cafe, enjoying their cold drinks and engaging in casual conversation. Unbeknownst to them, Stella has been observing their interaction from behind the counter, intrigued by the opportunity to play a mischievous game.

Spotting the familiar connection between the two, Stella saunters over to the counter, a mischievous glint in her eyes. She extends a hand towards Jeannine, introducing herself with a warm smile. "Hi there, I'm Stella. Pleasure to meet you," she says, her voice carrying an air of confidence.

Jeannine returns the gesture, shaking Stella's hand and sizing her up in curiosity. "Nice to meet you too," Jeannine says, her gaze flickering towards Dan for a moment before returning to Stella. "So, you're the one who hypnotizes these youngins?" she asks, a hint of amusement in her voice.

Stella chuckles, a mysterious twinkle in her eyes. "Ah, you've heard about that, have you? Well, let me show you a little trick." She snaps her fingers, and Dan, completely unaware of the impending intrusion upon his consciousness, shifts into a deep trance, his mind susceptible to Stella's influence.

Jeannine's eyes widen with surprise as Dan's vacant expression confirms the depths of his trance. She glances at Stella, a mix of curiosity and skepticism in her gaze. "Alright, show me something impressive, then," she challenges with a smirk.

Stella smirks back, feeling the energy shift in the atmosphere. She then instructs the entranced Dan to approach Jeannine, removing her sandals with utmost care, and offering to massage her feet. Dan, completely under Stella's control, obeys without hesitation, sinking to his knees and submitting himself to the vulnerable act.

Jeannine's amusement quickly morphs into enjoyment as a devious grin spreads across her face. She revels in the servility of her cousin, savoring the power dynamics at play. Stella's intentions are clear, and Jeannine follows along, letting herself indulge in this unexpected power trip.

Chuckling softly, Stella leans in closer to Jeannine and whispers a simple, post-hypnotic phrase that will activate Dan's foot massage reflex in the future. She emphasizes that Jeannine can use it discreetly whenever she desires. Although initially taken aback by the suggestion, Jeannine finds herself intrigued by the potential.

As the three of them share this peculiar moment, the distinct seventies bohemian vibe of Stella's café seems to shimmer in the warm summer air. Stella's mischievous ways and Jeannine's newfound control over her cousin create an unusual dynamic, one that, for now, stays within the boundaries of their peculiar relationship.

conversation.content: Write about a tsundere girl who is very strong but is brought to her knees when a certain object is put in a sensitive part of her body. She dosent like being dominated but is by a group of young girls who found her secret and brought her to all fours, Write more about how the girls humiliated her, getting her to meow like a cat on all fours, add dialogue

As a tsundere girl, Yasu was known to be fierce, independent, and self-assured. She was never one to back down from a fight, and she was always confident in her own strength and abilities.

But all that changed when a group of young girls discovered her secret weakness - a spot on her lower back that was incredibly sensitive to touch. They had stumbled upon this fact by accident, and had quickly realized that they had a powerful tool at their disposal.

And so they had set out to humiliate Yasu, to break her down and show her that she was not as strong and invincible as she thought. They had cornered her in a deserted alleyway, surrounded her, and then someone had reached out and touched that spot on her back.

Yasu had been transformed in an instant. She had gone from a fierce warrior to a trembling, purring kitten, unable to move or resist as the girls had their way with her.

It was humiliating beyond words, and Yasu hated every moment of it. She tried to fight back, to resist, to push the girls away - but they were too strong, too determined, too skilled at exploiting her weakness.

And so she was reduced to meowing and whimpering, to curling up into a ball and letting the girls do whatever they wanted to her. They pulled her hair, pinched her cheeks, tickled her ribs - and all the while, Yasu moaned and whimpered, unable to resist or to fight back.

It was a secret shame that haunted her for weeks afterwards, as she struggled to regain her sense of self and her confidence. She hated the feeling of being dominated, of being unable to resist or to fight back - but she knew, deep down, that there was nothing she could have done to stop the girls from exploiting her weakness.

And so she resigned herself to her fate, knowing that she would always be vulnerable to their power and their control. She hated it, but there was nothing she could do about it - except to learn from her mistakes and to be more careful in the future.

David nods slowly, still in a trance-like state from Ruth's hypnosis.

"Well, come on in then," Emma says, stepping aside to let him in.

David follows her into the living room, where Gina is waiting, sitting on the couch. She looks up as they enter and gives David a sly smile.

"Welcome, David," she says. "Ruth told me that you're here to do whatever I want. Is that right?"

David nods again, his mind still under Ruth's control.

"Good," Gina says. "I have a few things in mind for you. But first, let's get you out of those clothes."

David looks confused, but doesn't resist as Gina stands up and starts unbuttoning his shirt. Emma watches with interest, leaning against the wall and sipping a glass of wine.

Within minutes, David is standing in the living room wearing nothing but his boxers. Gina circles him, inspecting him from all angles.

"I have to say, David, your sister did a pretty good job with the hypnosis," she says. "You're so obedient and compliant. It's really quite impressive."

David just stares blankly at her, waiting for her next command.

"Okay," Gina says after a moment. "Here's what's going to happen. I want you to clean my entire house. Sweep, mop, vacuum, dust, do the dishes, everything. And I want you to do it all wearing nothing but your underwear."

David's eyes widen in shock, but he still doesn't protest.

"Understand?"

"Yes," he says in a monotone voice.

"Good," Gina says, handing him a broom. "Get to work."

David spends the next several hours cleaning Gina's house, completely naked except for his underwear. Emma watches him the whole time, occasionally offering him a sip of water or a piece of fruit, but otherwise just observing.

Finally, after what feels like an eternity, David finishes the last dish and collapses onto the couch, exhausted.

"Well done, David," Gina says, clapping him on the back. "You did a great job. And now, for your reward."

She reaches into her pocket and pulls out a small black remote.

"Ruth told me all about your little secret, David," she says, pressing a button on the remote. "And I have to say, I'm quite intrigued."

Suddenly, David feels a buzzing sensation in his underwear. He jumps up, his eyes widening in shock and embarrassment.

"What the hell?!" he stammers.

Emma and Gina burst out laughing, and David realizes that he's been had. Ruth had sent him over here as a prank, and they had taken full advantage of his hypnotized state.

He quickly gathers up his clothes and hurries out of the house, humiliated and confused.

But somewhere deep down, a small part of him wonders if maybe, just maybe, he might enjoy this kind of thing, if only he could do it on his own terms.

She offered to hypnotize him each morning before the doors opened, and soon he was extremely conditioned and easy to drop into submissive trance with a word or a finger snap from Stella. One warm day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s friends, Victoria, popped in to say hello and get a cuppa. (When she realizes the two are friends, Stella can’t help showing off to Victoria using a few of the post-hypnotic commands she’s implanted in David’s mind)

“Good morning, Victoria,” Stella greeted her cheerfully. “David, why don’t you get our lovely guest a cup of tea?”

Without hesitation, David nodded obediently and headed towards the kitchen area to prepare Victoria’s drink. Stella leaned in towards Victoria, a mischievous smile playing on her lips.

“Watch this,” she whispered, before calling out to David in a clear, commanding tone. “David, when you return with Victoria’s tea, you will kneel before her and ask if there’s anything else you can do for her.”

Victoria’s eyes widened as David returned with her tea and promptly kneeled before her as he had been told to do. She tried not to let her surprise or amusement show as she casually crossed her legs, seeing how far she could push this newfound power.

“Actually, David,” she said with a smirk, “I could use a napkin. Would you fetch one for me?”

David nodded and immediately went to grab a napkin, returning to Victoria’s side. She took the napkin and dabbed at her lips, relishing the fact that she could control David so easily.

Stella watched on with satisfaction, knowing that she had successfully programmed David to be her loyal and obedient servant. With every passing day, she would continue to reinforce her control over him, using him for her own pleasure and amusement as she saw fit.

She offered to hypnotize him each morning before the doors opened, and soon he was extremely conditioned and easy to drop into a submissive, obedient trance with a word or a finger snap from Stella. One warm day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s friends, Victoria, popped in to say hello and get a cuppa. (When she realizes the two are friends, Stella can’t help showing off to Victoria using a few of the post-hypnotic commands she’s implanted in David’s mind)

Stella greeted Victoria warmly, but then she turned to David and snapped her fingers. Instantly, he stood up and rushed over to the counter, ready to take Victoria’s order.

“David, why don’t you show Victoria how quickly you can make her favorite drink?” Stella suggested.

David eagerly complied, moving with speed and precision as he prepared a latte for Victoria. She watched in amazement as he moved seemingly on autopilot, following Stella’s commands without question.

“Wow, he’s really good,” Victoria said, impressed.

Stella beamed. “I’ve been working with him every morning, getting him to the point where he’s completely under my control. It’s amazing what a well-placed trigger word can do.”

David’s eyes glowed with devotion as he continued to work, lost in his hypnotic trance.

Victoria frowned slightly. “Isn’t that a little controlling, Stella? I mean, he’s your employee, not your personal plaything.”

Stella chuckled. “Oh, don’t worry. It’s all in good fun. And David loves it, don’t you, darling?”

David nodded eagerly. “Yes, Mistress. I love serving you.”

Victoria shook her head, wondering if this was really such a healthy dynamic. But as she sipped her latte, she couldn’t deny that it was delicious and made exactly to her liking. And she had to admit there was something intriguing about the power Stella had over David. Maybe, she thought, she’d have to come back and see more of this dynamic in action.
